column1: wayward first ball, length ball on iddle and leg, and angling way down
better line, fullish outside off and angling further away. Left alone
full outside off, and moving a bit away. Left alone
full on his toes, and flicked past square leg. Triple at deep while fine leg cleans up
appeal for lbw but maybe too high. Umpire Dar says no. Length ball, zipping in as Markram shoulders his arms
fullish, outside leg stump first ball from Hasan Ali. Keeper has to dive to his left to intercept

driven! Not the best timing, but enough to clear cover. Fielders give it a chase, and Azhar cleans up with the ball slowing down near the boundary, but replays suggest that it's four. An Azhar has also left the field, perhaps nursing a injury
full outside off, angling away. Shoulders his arms
full, on his pads, and flicked fine! Elgar's on a roll and Hasan's been a bit wayward
good length, outside off, and staying low. Checks the cut last moment, and the ball goes through to Rizwan
worked to the off side and he's off the mark
overpitched outside off, and Elgar looks to drive, but the ball goes past his outside edge. Slip cordon groans in unison
good length just outside off. Squares the batsman up, but past his edge again
full, just outside off, and he presses forward to drive past the bowler's right! Races away to long off
good length, just outside off. Left alone
full, just outside off, swinging away and Markram plays an imperious cover drive!
good length, outside off. Tapped off the back foot to cover
tapped with soft hands to give the strike to Markram
back of a length, on middle. Rising delivery, and he rides the bounce before fending with soft hands
full outside off, in the channel angling away. Left alone. No ball too
good length, outside off. Hits the deck hard, and nice bounce to the keeper
full on off. Presses forward to defend
full, on off, and another front-foot defense

taken! And what a catch at second slip. Good length ball angling away, looks to defend, takes the outside edge and second slip dives in front of first slip to take a low catch! The Pakistan team are in a huddle
full pitching outside leg, lets it go down leg side to the keeper.
full on off, presents a full face to defend into the off side.
fullish length angled across sixth stump, Elgar thinks about attacking it but leaves it alone after moving his front foot across.
overpitched on the legs, just caresses this into the gap at midwicket, theatrical tumbling stop by mid-on ranging to his left.
fullish length on middle, flicks this through wide mid-on and tracked down by Faheem for a pair.
good length ball on the legs, flicked to square leg.
back of a length on fourth stump, goes back to defend into midwicket.
back of a length outside off on fifth stump, left alone.
good length ball wide outside off, shoulders arms again.
bouncer over middle at 137 kph/85 mph, Elgar ducks under it comfortably.

back of a length tighter to off stump, opens the face of the bat to glide this with soft hands along the ground between backward point and gully, teases gully chasing it all the way to the rope, attempt to slap it back in is in vain.
good length ball seams back in on fourth stump line, Elgar shuffles across and shoulders arms as Afridi puts his hands on his head sighing in despair. A very confident, tight leave.
full on the stumps, flicks this toward midwicket, diving stop in the ring.
good length ball outside off, left alone.
fullish length in the fifth stump channel at 143 kph/89 mph, left alone and keeps a touch low on the way through to the keeper.

edge! Just fails to carry! Consistent lack of carry in this pitch so far. Hasan pitched it up on fourth stump to draw van der Dussen into a forward prod, but he did it with soft hands and it short hops Imran diving across first slip again. Identical to the catching effort he made to claim Markram but this time it doesn't carry.
back of a length ball on fourth stump, defended back to Hasan.
full and swinging away very wide outside off stump, left alone.
good length ball swinging away from sixth stump at 136 kph/86 mph, left alone.
full on fourth stump, Elgar steps forward and smothers it with a full face into the covers.
overpitched on fifth stump, almost yorker length, jammed out into backward point.
back of a length on off, punched off the back foot toward extra cover.
back of a length on fifth stump at 138 kph/86 mph, goes back to defend and a thick edge goes in front of point for an easy single.
overpitched on middle and leg, almost yorker length, and jammed out to midwicket.
full outside off on sixth stump, Elgar leaves it alone.
full and angled down leg, Elgar can't flick this away and Rizwan fumbles the take diving to his left, it dribbles away to allow a bye.
fullish length on off stump at 134 kph/84 mph, flicked to midwicket.
overpitched on off stump, just leans forward to flick this gently past short midwicket and it picks up pace rolling downhill beyond the ring, teases mid-on chasing it all the way to the rope.
fullish length on fifth stump, defended on the front foot to extra cover.
bangs it in short on fifth stump, van der Dussen isn't fazed as it sits up for him to bash a front foot pull through midwicket, skittles along the ground to the rope.
back of a length into the hips, Elgar can't flick this away and it dribbles back toward Shaheen.
back of a length on sixth stump at 138 kph/86 mph, punches this off the back foot safely into the cover gap and it races away. Pure timing.
back of a length on the stumps, defended.
short and very wide, freebie to smash through point but a diving stop on the ring saves four.
back of a length on off stump, swivels to short arm jab pull this to deep fine leg.
full on middle, defended back to the bowler.
full on off at 131 kph/82 mph, defended into the off side.
good length ball angled into off stump at 132 kph/82 mph, defended toward mid-off.
good length ball angled across fifth stump at 132 kph/82 mph, defended again toward mid-off.
good length ball but strays on the pads at 133 kph/83 mph, Elgar keeps his hands back to flick this gently through midwicket and it's chased down short of the rope for a pair.
good length ball angled across fourth stump, defended with soft hands to backward point.
full on off stump, punched to mid-off.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back and across to punch toward mid-on.
full on off stump, smothered on the front foot.
full on middle, flicked along the ground through midwicket.
arm ball skids on but an inside edge from the looks of it with van der Dussen prodding forward, big lbw shout denied. No discussion for DRS and they know there's a thick edge.
full outside off and pushed down the ground to deep mid-off.
flighted full on fifth stump, defended on the front foot to Nauman.
begins with a wide ball outside off stump van der Dussen's not interested in
rears up from a length slightly, hits him high on the bat
82mph, wide outside off stump again
wicket-to-wicket, he moved forward and blocks
gorgeous shot from van der Dussen. Just leans into a front foot drive and guides it through extra cover. The timing sees it race away for four
fuller from Faheem in response, and he blocks assuredly again
flighted, Elgar eases it into the offside and the pair exchange ends
slightly flatter, defended off the front foot
slides this one through at 55mph, a little quicker than he wants to be.
poked into the offside
he's bowling a little quicker than perhaps might reap him rewards. Blocked
short of a length, and he pushes it to mid-on as the pair steal a single
targeting the middle stump, but van der Dussen's defensive technique looks fairly bulletproof right now

he's gone! What on earth just happened here? van der Dussen set off for a single after a push to mid-off, but Elgar sent him back. He was stranded way, waaay down the crease, with no hope of getting back. Rizwan collected and as both keeper and batsman dived, replays show Rizwan knocked off the bails well in time. Huge, unnecessary blow for South Africa
pushed him onto the back foot, defended first up
thick outside edge gets du Plessis off the mark
full and wide. Elgar leaned into it, but doesn't quite have the timing to penetrate the field
angling into Elgar, defends to end a successful over for Pakistan
flicked away to midwicket
slower through the air. du Plessis is cautious in defence
driven to mid-off
testing delivery. Landed on leg-stump and looked to square du Plessis up as he defends off the back foot
confidently driven through the covers, albeit straight to a fielder
defended, and Nauman Ali begins his battle with Faf du Plessis with a maiden
Elgar looked to run it through the slips, but sharp work in there thwarts that plan
probing line. Moved away off the seam and Elgar poked at it uncertainly. Doesn't get any bat on it, mind, and it doesn't carry to him anyway
fuller, and he drives it to short cover. The runs have dried up somewhat since that RVD wicket
short of a length, fended to the onside
opens up the offside with an elegant drive for a single
that one looked like it stopped in the pitch. Slightly uppish but no real cause for concern
worked away to mid-on and good running gets them a single
exquisite. Carves a crowded offside field with a perfectly placed front foot drive. Races away for du Plessis's first boundary
Hops down the pitch slightly, but never a chance of getting to the pitch of it. Defended
poked to mid-on and they run a single. The urgency has been better this over from South Africa
driven to cover, where sharp fielding prevents Elgar from keeping the strike
full outside off, and pushed to cover
full, on his toes, and flicked! Races away past the fielder at fine leg. Played it very square, past Shaheen
full, on off. Firmly defended off the front foot
good length, wide outside off. Sees the ball through to Rizwan
goodlength, wide outside off. Slapped in front of cover and mid off intercepts
full, wanting du Plessis to drive. But he defends it firmly
good length on off, but the ball stays low! He's hurried onto the back foot, and manages to tap it away
fullish outside off and driven to cover
full, just outside off. Goes back and fends it away to the off side
fullish, outside off, and he wants to defend, but it takes the outside edge and goes past first slip
tossed up, near his toes on off. Nudged to the leg side
full, on off. Presses forward and caresses this through midwicket! Played with the turn
full, and wider outside off. Defended with soft hands
fullish, just outside off, and driven to mid off, but finds the fielder
full, little wide outside off. Tiny step towards the ball and defended
full on middle. Presses forward to defend
fullish, just outside off. Slower ball, an offcutter, and a bit of extra bounce. Defended with soft hands. Only 117kph
harder length this time. Lands on off and angling into his body. Nudged leg side
good length, just outside off. Punched to cover
good length, and pushed off the back foot to long on
tossed up outside off and skids through. Blocked off the back foot
tossed up on leg stump, and caressed to long off
full on leg stump. Pushed leg side, but stopped by midwicket
full on off, and he smothers it with the turn to the leg side
overstepped! full on middle, and worked off his toes to square leg
full on middle and leg. Driven to wide long off

good length, just outside off, and punched towards the off side. Babar runs across from cover after short cover got a hand to it .Collects with one hand, and then throws it from near the bowler's stumps to the batsman's end. Nearly hits Elgar at the bowler's end!
fullish outside off, and defended square on the off side
full, on off. Brings his bat down and defends to short mid on
good length on off and middle. Faf shuffles across, gets in front of the stumps, and defends
full, just outside off from wide of the stumps. Check drives to mid on
full, outside off and turning into Elgar. Defended towards midwicket
full on off. Turning into him, and worked past short leg
full, just outside off. Flicked from his toes to midwicket
full, just outside off. Flicked behind square, bringing deep backward square leg into play
tossed up, and he drives, but hits into the deck. Yasir intercepts on the followthrough
full outside off, and he drives with the turn. Work for deep extra cover running to his left
full outside off from around the wicket. Defended, mistimed, towards mid on
good length, wide outside off. Plays it late, from under his eyes, but cutting late behind square
full, just outside off. Driven to mid on, where Babar is lurking
fullish, just outside off and angling in. Defended with soft hands
good length, just outside off. Fended with the bat's open face to point
good length, outside off, and played towards point.
thick inside edge onto the pad that popped up in the air - that was a chance! A fairly easy one, too, and Abid Ali should have taken that. Faf gets away with one first ball!
pushes Elgar onto the back foot, and he defends to the legside
moves out of his crease to defend
prodigious spin, and Elgar tries the reverse sweep. He misses and that races away to the boundary for four byes! All happening in this over
around the wicket, slightly shorter this time and kept low
solid block to end an entertaining first over post-lunch. South Africa survive
driven on the up to mid-off
fuller and slightly wide, de Plessis digs it out
pulls his length back slightly. Driven to the offside
fuller and targeting the stumps. du Plessis has to be watchful. Shaheen has continued to look like the biggest threat today
gets some room, and he pounces on it. Half-volley outside off stump and he carves it through the covers. South Africa bring up their hundred
defends to end the over
pushed down the ground to give du Plessis the strike
poor delivery from Yasir for a change. Short and sat up nicely for du Plessis, who got his footwork sorted to flick it through midwicket for a boundary

brilliant from Yasir, he's got the former South African captain! Beautifully flighted, classic legspinner. Drifted in and spun away from the right-hander, who's tentative push only succeeds in making contact with the outside edge. Sharp catch from Rizwan behind the stumps, and Yasir's enterprising start after lunch is rewarded
loose delivery to start Faf off. Short and heading down the legside, de Kock helps it on and gets off the mark with a couple to fine leg
much better. Flighted, angling in. QdK gets on the front foot to defend
Similar, and that brings an end to an over where Yasir was finally rewarded

tailing down the legside, and Elgar feathers it to fine leg, out of the reach of a diving Rizwan. It goes to the fence, and that is a half-century for Dean Elgar. Very impressive knock in what were expected to be challenging circumstances
driven to mid-off off the front foot
pushes him onto the back foot, poked on the bounce to the slips

opens the face of the bat, looking to run it down to third man. Sharp work from Imran Butt at gully. He's been sharp this morning so far. Pakistan will hope he contributes not just with the bat but also in the field
short, wide, and while Elgar might have had lunch, he will still gobble this up. Opens the face and times it past backward point for a boundary
kept slightly low, and Elgar misses the cut. Rare expensive over from Shaheen Afridi, and the runs continue to flow
flighted, and driven to cover
moves onto the back foot to defend
a touch short, and QdK flicks it to the onside
squared him up, and he defends
a tad short once more. Makes it comfortable to deal with him off the back foot. Needs to draw the left-handers out
Ends on a brighter note. Wider off the crease and spinning back in, de Kock was a little less sure of himself dealing with that
a little too close to the body to cut, but QdK tries it anyway. Finds the man at backward point
moves onto the front foot and leans into a drive without quite finding the timing
decent line, just outside offstump and wobbling slightly. He gets it through the covers, though, and the pair come back for a couple
driven on the up. Hung in the air teasingly before Fawad Alam collects it at point on the bounce
Tailing in, defended to mid-on
gets it through that gap between gully and backward point. Qdk loves that little jab down the offside, and he manages to make that shot bear fruit to end the over.
continues around the wicket, defended back to the bowler

Deft flick from de Kock, and Elgar nearly ran himself out trying to come back for two. That second run was never really on, but QdK had to shout 'No!' several times before his teammate finally got the message
front foot prod to mid-on
worked away to the onside. A touch short from Yasir again
so good from the captain. Saw this one drifting down the leg side, and he unsheaths a cross-batted sweep shop that fine leg has no chance of cutting off. Another productive over for South Africa
too full, driven to long-on for one
opens the face looking to beat mid-off, but the man stationed there cuts it off
defended to short midwicket
worked down to square leg
driven back to Nauman
a bit of turn for him. Elgar was unsure whether to go forward or back, and on that note of uncertainty, Nauman caps a tight over
Reverse sweep comes out. It's not middled, but the edge bounces over the slips and allows the pair to scamper through
flicked to the onside
Slightly full, almost yorked him. Elgar works it to midwicket
sharp turn from wide outside the off stump. It's one of those balls that Elgar has looked ever so slightly uncertain about
flicked to the onside
full toss, driven back to Yasir Shah
off-stump line, blocked

and de Kock falls trying to wallop Nauman over cow corner! It's one of those shots that looks AWFUL when it doesn't come off. He never got underneath it and scoops it straight to wide midwicket, where the excellent Imran Butt takes a sharp catch. De Kock is on his knees in disbelief, and Pakistan have a fourth
leans into a drive straight to short extra cover
flatter from Nauman and Bavuma drove on the back foot
squared him up, and he's lucky to get an edge on that. Had it missed, it would have been dead in front. Pakistan suddenlt on top
quicker and Bavuma shoulders arms
Driven down the ground
front foot defense to a flighted delivery
similar once more, a bit of turn for Yasir. Bavuma looking fairly solid to start
deft flick through the onside, and Bavuma keeps the strike. Another probing over
flighted, just outside off, defended to the onside
Copy and paste, really. South Africa have suddenly been forced into their shells somewhat
no timing on the drive to mid-on

and SA are crumbling here. Elgar falls now! Played for spin that wasn't there, trying to punch it through the offside. Gets a juicy outside edge for a comfortable catch at first slip. Another one of those shots he won't exactly be proud of. It's been a good innings, but South Africa needed much, much more
pushed back, defended to Nauman
poked through the offside and Linde keeps the strike. Pakistan are flying here, even getting direct hits in!
angling in from around the wicket. Linde moves across to defend
missed the poke to the onside, hits him on the pads, but not really an lbw candidate
he's moving across his stumps and taking the lbw out as he tries to cope with Yasir
another way to cope, of course, is by getting off strike, which he does with a flick to square leg
and Bavuma keeps the strike with a drive down the ground. The diminutive batsman has a giant role to play here now
off stump line, Bavuma moves back and across to defend
outside off stump and he lets it go
pushed through quicker and sliding down leg side as it hits him on the pad
straigtens around middle stump, Bavuma defends
slightly short, Bavuma wanted to punch it through the covers but it keeps low. Engrossing cricket
defended to mid-on
pushed him onto the backfoot to defend
driven down the ground back to the bowler
sees it tailing down the legside, and he flicks it away to get the senior batsman back on strike
pushed out to cover off the front foot. Reached for it slightly
slashed away off the backfoot, but backward point cuts it off
another stifling over for South Africa ends. Bavuma defends off the back foot
gives that a good wallop, and gets a nice chunk of silly mid-off, too. Have that for standing so close, Abid Ali! To be fair to the poor man, he did end up saving three runs
shorter and flatter, defended away to the onside
a bit more flight and he tempts Bavuma into a drive down to mid-off, which puts Linde back on strike
defended down the ground
ends with another defensive shot, and that's drinks in a mini-session that has belonged firmly to Pakistan. South Africa have work to do, and it needs to begin with this partnership
full on middle, and he smothers the ball with a front foot defense
full on middle and leg. Driven, but finds mid on
width offered, length ball. Backs away to cut, but mistimed to point
fullish, outside off and turning away. Left alone
good length, outside off, and this one turns in. Goes deep, and pulls, but mistimes it to the right of mid on
good length on middle and turning into leg. Whipped to square leg
good length on off, and turning in. Rocks back and punches to mid on
a boundary after ten overs! Full, on off, and he skips down the ground, and hammers it past the non-striker. Team 150
good length, outside off and it stays low. Linde plays at it, and under-edges  it towards first slip
good length, on middle. Flicked to square leg in the deep
around the wicket, full on off. Defended with soft hands
fullish on middle and worked off his pads to midwicket. Will keep the strike
tossed up on middle and leg. Dug out, down the ground
fullish, little wide outside off. Shoulders his arms

tossed up, just outside off, and enough time to bring the bat down for a confident drive. Faheem gives it a chase, and drags it back from near the boundary line with a one-two combination throw with Hasan Ali
full on off from around the wicket. Nudged with the turn towards leg slip
width offered, good length. Sticks his bat out and edges it past first slip

yorker length on middle. Wants to dig it out but late to bring his bat down. Appeal for lbw and given by Aleem Dar! Linde reviews straightaway. Replays show that it pitched on middle near his boots. Linde misses the swipe and it hits his front leg. No bat involved...and ball tracking says pitches in line, impact in line, but missing leg stump! Dar is wrong, Linde is right. South Africa stay five down
good length, from around the wicket. Lands on off. Defended off the back foot
good length on off. Presses forward to block
fullish, on off. Rocks back and punches towards cover
fuller, on leg, and nudged off his boots to midwicket
overpitched, just outside off. Mistimes a straight shot towards the off side
good length, on off and turning in. Punched, and stopped by Fawad at midwicket
full just outside off and turning away. Pushed towards cover with the turn
tossed up, quite wide. Square drive finds point though
tossed up on off and driven to mid on. Quick call for one, and comfortably completed
good length on off and turning in. Flicked off the back foot to short fine leg
flicked into the gap as he rocks back to this good length ball. Gets the gap between midwicket and square leg, and Linde puts it away
overpitched on off, and he flicks it hard. Finds midwicket though
full on middle, and defended back to the bowler
fullish, on middle and leg. Tucked square to square leg
fullish, on off. Presses forward to defend
full on off, and he covers his stumps before blocking towards short midwicket
good length, just outside off. Stands tall and punches towards cover. Fielder runs to his right, dives and keeps it down to one
defends this length ball off the back foot
full on off, and defended
full on middle, and defends
full outside off, and he drills a drive past silly mid off. Cover cleans up though
full on off. Clears the front leg, and drives well, but Faheem - at mid off - dives to his left and saves three
full on off. Gets his front leg to the pitch of the ball, and fends it towards the leg side
good length, just outside off. Big stride forward, and blocked
good length, from around the stumps. Lands on off, and fended off the back foot
good length, outside off, and angling in. Blocked
good length, outside off, enough room to cut. But bottom-edged onto the deck. No ball
full, just outside off and angling in. Drilled towards cover  off the front foot
full on middle and leg. Tapped past the non striker and off they go for a single
full on middle and leg. Wants to drive, good intent, but mistimed. Shaheen's overstepped again
full on off, near his toes, and hit back to Shaheen. Picks up and aims at the stumps on the followthrough

the extra ball in the over is punished as Linde presses forward to this full ball and caresses a drive past cover. Hasan Ali runs, dives, and drags it back, but looks like his body was touching the ropes when flicking the ball back
change of ends for Nauman as he comes around the stumps to Bavuma. Fullish, on off, and hit back gently
full on middle. Big stride forward and blocked from under his eyes
fullish, on leg. Wants to flick it fine, but misses. Hits the thigh and rolls past the keeper
over the stumps, full and wide, and he comes down the wicket to drive. Hit along the ground to Nauman
good length, outside off. Turning in. Opens the bat's face and guides it off the back foot towards cover
full, on middle. Pushed off the back foot towards the non-striker, and Nauman scurries across to stop the single
full outside off from around the wicket. Turning in, and worked off the back foot to the on side
full, just outside off. Smothered with soft hands towards the leg side
fullish on off, and flicked with the turn to deep midwicket. Races there, so only one for the taking
good length, just outside off. Punched towards cover
good length on off, and worked off the back foot to the off side
tossed up, just outside off. Defended
good length, outside off and turning in. Punched to mid on
full, just outside off, but he gets his front foot across and plays a Tendulkar-eqsue paddle sweep pasts the keeper
full just outside off, and drilled to cover. Faheem intercepts
full on middle and leg. Pushed towards short mid on
full, on off. Defended firmly
full on leg. Defended off the front foot towards the on side
full, just outside off. He gets to the pitch of the ball and blocks
good length, outside off and turning in. Stays on the back foot and defends
tossed up, on off. Defensive shot flies to the leg side
full, just outside off. Defends, but a bat-pad combo pops the ball in the air. Falls kind of far away from short leg though
full, and wide, slightly overpitched. Wants to drive, but misses. This one didn't turn conventionally, went the other way
full, just outside off. Big stride and blocked
good length, outside off. Tries to cut but under-edged onto the stumps
full, on off. Presses forward and blocks with soft hands

full, on middle. Front leg goes across to off stump, and the paddle sweep goes to fine leg. They want two runs though, and the throw is at the top of the stumps! Rizwan whips it off, and this could be dangerous for Bavuma, and yes, Bavuma has not calculated this second run. Excellent flat throw, great keeping, and that's the second run-out this innings for South Africa. Hasan Ali with the amazing throw and Younis Khan has enjoyed this from the dug out.
good length, just outside off. Defensive shot off the back foot takes an edge and goes to point
length ball angling into middle and leg stump. Fended off the back foot
good length on leg stump, offers no shot and hits his front leg. Would've gone sliding down leg though
full on off, and flicked towards short leg
good length, outside off. Flayed off the back foot to mid on
good length, on middle. Flicked to square leg off the back foot
full on off. Big stride and blocked
full on middle. Flicked off his pads to square leg
full on middle. Blocked
full, outside off, and he shoulders his arms
good length, on off. Gets onto the back foot and defends
full, nearly yorker length. Dug out
good length, on off. Fended off the back foot
full, on off. Tight defense off the front foot
full, just outside off. Skids straight through as he shoulders his arms
around the wicket to start, Linde gets in line and blocks
back and across, defended to mid-off
targeting that off stump, but Linde equal to the challenge so far
slightly shorter, driven back to him
back and across to defend
opens the face and angles to extra cover. Maiden to kick us off
flight and drift from Yasir. Maharaj defends but this seems like a battle Yasir will win

and he does! Wow that happened sooner than I expected! Maharaj played for the turn, but it went straight on and through the gate between bat and pad to crash into off stump. Maharaj gone, and South Africa sink further into trouble
defended back to the bowler
luxuriant stride in and defends through the offside
pushes him onto the back foot, Rabada cautiously defends one that kept low
thick inside edge and a wicket-maiden comes to an end. SA flailing here

Short ball from Hasan and Linde gets himself a boundary. First runs of the session. Never quite in control, it was a top edge, but South Africa need every run they can get as they look to push past 200
front foot drive to short extra, that's been called a no-ball
slower ball that Linde eases to the onside
slightly back of a length, hits Rabada on the top of the bat
poked to the offside
full toss well outside off, even Rabada should perhaps have put it away, but finds a fielder instead
fourth stump line, Rabada solid in defense
flighted from around the wicket, Linde watchfully guides to the onside
Over the wicket this time, fended away
slightly short of a length, Linde bunts it through the offside to get off strike
a touch too short, but since the ball's keeping low, Rabada has to be careful
wrong'un, but the batsman reads it and blocks
His patience finally snaps as he crunches the bowler through the offside with a lovely drive. Held the pose for that one too, and gets himself off the mark
And Linde joins in now. Nothing quite working for Hasan here. Leans into a slightly wide delivery, opening the face and easing it to the third man boundary

and as soon as I say that, Hasan strikes! Pushes Linde onto the backfoot and instead of keeping it down, he scoops it straight to the man deep midwicket. Mohammad Nawaz, in as a substitute, completes an easy catch to send Linde on his way after a decent innings
seems to have got his swagger back and bangs down a bouncer to Rabada, who respectfully ducks under. That's another no-ball, by the way
angling away from the batsman, thick outside edge to point
85mph an hour this time, defended by Rabada
blocked
and a bouncer finishes off the over
takes a big stride out and blocks
short and spinning away, Linde punches it to the offside, but straight to a fielder
Big appeal for lbw, but Aleem Dar feels like that got an inside edge, and replays bear him out
fuller and quicker. Nortje planted the front foot, and for a moment looked an lbw candidate, but survives
angling away and Rabada shoulders arms
dropped! Yasir Shah looked flummoxed by that, though I'm not sure why. Thick, juicy edge at a very nice height, and Babar shells it. Hasan doesn't look best pleased
Two in a row! Another drop! This time it's Rizwan, though this was significantly harder. He got a left glove on it that popped it up in the air, and tried to catch it as he fell, to no avail
slower ball, and Rabada plays and misses at that
bunts it to the offside to conclude an over he was lucky to survive
skids through pushing Nortje back
defended back to Yasir
castles him this time. That was almost like a flipper. Perfect length, with Nortje not sure whether to move forward or back, and could only watch helplessly as it cannons into the off stump
confident front foot stride, defended
leg-stump line, blocked by Ngidi
flight and drift, and well defended by Ngidi. Can SA somehow get to 200?
that's a confident shot, isn't it?! Strides out and drives him over cover for four. Rabada has decided he's going to attack Hasan
Bunted to square leg and the two scamper back for a couple. That brings up the 200 for South Africa
Kept low, and fortunately for Rabada, that wasn't in line with the stumps
Slower ball yorker, almost did for him, but the batsman just manages to dig it out
and that might be the shot of the day. What a majestic strike that was. Leaned back and swivelled across to pull Hasan over midwicket. Clean off the middle of the bat and superbly timed.
ends with a dot to ensure Ngidi's on strike for Yasir, but Rabada still manages ten off that over
defended
the wrong'un nearly did for him. He tried to slash it away and nearly got an inside edge through to Rizwan
lovely turn and bounce, that was much too good for Ngidi to nick
flatter through the air, and Ngidi's confident in defence
another googly that hits Ngidi on the pads, but not quite an lbw shout. The number 11 survives!
driven through the offside. Hasan Ali continuing is a bit of interesting call
whacks him away to square leg. Decides to take the single, which makes this a duel between Ngidi and Hasan
full ball that Ngidi drives down the ground
driven straight to short extra
that's a poor delivery from Hasan and these are useful runs for South Africa. Waited for it to come onto the bat and slashes it through backward point
targeting middle stump but Ngidi's resolute in defence
flicked to the onside
and Rabada whacks it over the fence for six. It's not quite six, it's caught, but Shaheen Afridi overbalanced and had one foot outside the rope while still holding onto the ball.
defended back to the bowler
goes for another almighty heave, but that one's a googly he hadn't read. Misses it by some distance
Sharp turn and thick inside edge onto the pad. Another productive over for South Africa
Greeted with a boundary! A little fortuitous, this was a thick outside edge that went through the gap between the slips and gully. Partnership worth 25 now

struck on the pads, and the umpire gives it! He came across a fair way and this looks dead, even though South Africa have reviewed. To no avail, though, that's hitting. Shaheen makes a difference pretty much straightaway, and South Africa end their innings with 220
good length, outside off and left alone
full, quite wide outside off, and through to de Kock
good length, fifth-stump line outside off, and Butt offers no shot for the third ball in a row
full and wide, and Butt wanted to get off the mark. Tries to drive but misses with the ball moving away slightly
good length on off and coming in. Tentatively blocked towards the leg side, through his legs 89mph
good length, just outside off, and he keeps his bat well inside, nowhere near the delivery. A maiden to kickstart Rabada's spell
goes for the overpitched ball just outside off. Ali looks to drive but toe-ends it to cover
goes for the full ball again. Lands just on off, and he drives it back to the bowler
full on off again, and driven with the full face of the bat again. Back to the bowler
back of a length on middle, and he ducks under the line of the delivery
play and miss as this length ball just outside off induces Ali to cut. No connection
Two maidens in a row. Good length on middle, and he blocks firmly with the bat under his eye
back of a length, outside off, and he shoulders his arms
good length outside off again. No shot offered, through to de Kock
full on off, forcing the debutant to play. Driven straight back, past Rabada, to mid off
fullish, just outside off. Butt wants to drive, but it whizzes past the outside edge
short on off and aimed at the body. Butt half-ducks, takes his eyes off the ball, and the delivery goes past his shoulder
full, just outside off. Firmly defended towards cover
first runs! Full outside off, and the check-drive with the bat's open face goes past point
back of a length on off, and he swivels to pull. First runs in Test cricket as the ball rolls to fine leg
good length, outside off. Bends his knees and punches to cover's left
good length, just outside off. Gets behind the ball's line and blocks
good length on off and angling into the stumps. Defended off the back foot towards mid on
full on off, and pushed past Nortje to mid off

off stump rattled! And that's the first Pakistan wicket. Good length ball, doesn't bounce as much, Abid Ali defends expecting the ball to come near his chest, but it stays a bit low, goes under the bat, and knocks off stump. Was also late into the shot, beaten by pace
starts with a yorker, around off, and Azhar brings the bat down to dig it away towards point
fullish, on middle, and defended towards mid on with quick hands
back of a length just outside off. Ali rides the bounce and fends from near his chest with soft hands
back of a length, on middle, and he ducks under it swiftly
good length outside off, and he is not tempted to play at it
length ball on off, and tapped to cover. Butt wants one, Azhar doesn't, and the batsman has to scurry back
full ball, just outside off. Gets to the pitch and shoulders his arms
tries the short ball, but he is quick to pick the length. Swivels, and confidently pulls in front of square
good length, just outside off. Shoulders his arms
full on middle, and flicked behind square, off his legs
fullish, on off. Gets behind the line of the ball and blocks
full on off, and flicked to deep backward square leg.  Concedes his first run, actually two, because he's overstepped as well
good length on off. Worked off his hips to backward square for a run
good length, just outside off. Azhar sees the ball through to the keeper
good length, just outside off. Gets on top of the bounce and punches it past cover. Man in the deep cleans up

off the glove! Good length on off and seaming in, takes some extra bounce a he looks to defend. Hits the glove, pops up in the air, and the specific fielder at leg gully comes into play. Petersen the sub, and Butt's first Test innings ends after 25 deliveries
good length ball outside off, and Babar lets it go
full, just outside off. Presses forward to defend, and that should be the end of the over, except it isn't. He's overstepped
good length, wider outside off and he shoulders his arms
full just outside off. Azhar covers off stump with his front leg and then shoulders his arms
full, on off, and pushed with the straight bat
back of a length outside off, around the fourth-stump channel. Azhar is quick to sway out of the line
good length, just outside off. He shoulders his arms
back of a length, on middle. Uncomfortably blocked towards the leg side with the bat near his face
good length, just outside off and left alone
full on off and he presses forward swiftly to defend it right into the pitch
fullish, just outside off and angling in. Fended after bending his knees to ensure the ball doesn't go through him
good length, just outside off, and blocked away off the back foot to cover
off the mark with a nudge to the leg side
good length, on off an some extra bounce. Fended leg side
good length, just outside off, and he shoulders his arms
length ball outside off but seaming in. Nudged towards square leg
good length, just outside off, and fended away towards cover
full ball, blocked
worked off his hips to backward square
full, on off, and driven with the bat's closed face to midwicket
length ball, angling in, and he nudges it gently towards midwicket
good length on off, and worked off his hips to the leg side
good length, on off. Presses forward and works it leg side
good length, just outside off. Pushed away towards cover
good length, on his pads, and flicked in front of square on the leg side. Deep midwicket cleans up
length ball, just outside off, and Ali tentatively fends with soft hands from near his chest
good length, on middle,  and flicked to Bavuma at backward square. Nearly carried
length ball, angling into his body, and worked off his hips to fine leg
he's overstepped after bowling an excellent length ball in the channel outside off. Azhar covers his off stump before shouldering his arms
fullish, on off and angling in. Defended towards miwicket
good length, on middle and leg. Defended with the bat away from the body. Ball rolls away to midwicket
full on middle and leg. Worked off his pads past the diving square leg fielder to the deep. This one stayed low
pushed back to Ngidi. This was a full ball on off and middle, and Babar had to jam his bat down
fullish, on off, and blocked firmly back to the bowler
good length on off stump. Stays on the back foot to defend
good length on middle, and flicked to fine leg, where Ngidi swoops the ball in one motion
short ball, outside off. Babar wants to drag a pull from beyond the stumps. Toe-ends it towards cover
length ball, just outside off, and punched towards cover point. A misfield allows the single to be taken without any chance of a run out
good length on off, and the ball stays low. Ali keeps his eyes on the ball and meets it low, near his knee roll. Defended back to Nortje
good length, on off. Defended with soft hands off the back foot
length ball outside off. Ball stays low as he sticks the bat out. Edged towards the slip cordon
full and fast, outside off stump. Babar sees it go into de Kock's gloves
good length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
full on off, and the attempted on drive is spliced to deep midwicket
full, just outside  off stump. Left alone
full on off, and the on drive is sprayed towards the right of mid on
fullish, and whizzing straight through to de Kock. Babar was looking to drive but eventually offers no shot
good length, on off. Rides the bounce and blocks it away
full on his pads, and worked off his pads to deep square leg for a walking single
back of a length, on off, and he ducks swiftly albeit with no eyes on the ball
full outside off, and he presses forward to defend with soft hands. Bat turns in his hand and the ball rolls away to point
fullish, just outside off stump. Pushed to cover
full, on off. Defended with the front foot
good length on off and skidding through. Azam makes room to flay a cut, and does it at the last moment. Ball nearly hit his back leg there

full on off, and big appeal for lbw and given! Babar Azam reviews, but he seemed reluctant about it. This was full on off, skidding right through, a quicker ball if you will. He looked to defend with the bat in front of off stump, but it hits him near middle. No bat involved, and ball tracking shows three reds. Would've hit leg stump and Babar is out, Dar is right, Maharaj is ecstatic, and Pakistan are in trouble.
full outside off from over the stumps. Goes through Shaheen's bat-pad defense
full, just outside off, and defended. Four fielders around the batsman
drops the length slightly, good length outside off, and Afridi wants to defend off the back foot. Just past his outside edge
oops, he's given the nightwatchman the strike against a bowler at 90mph by taking a single first ball. Full on middle, and worked leg side

and that's why there's merit in protecting the nightwatchman against such pace, especially when you've already faced 32 balls. Will Pakistan send another nightwatchman? That's absolutely gone through Shaheen. Full, fast, on middle, and it's broken middle stump before he could even get the bat down
good length, on leg stump. Worked away to the leg side, but no run taken
stump to stump, and defended to the leg side. They sscamper across
yorker, on leg, and he digs it away to fine leg, where Ngidi cleans up
good length, on off, and he slaps this over point! Races away for four
yorker length, on leg, and pushed away to midwicket
full on leg, and pushed to midwicket again
full on off, and driven to cover
full on leg stump,  and driven to cover inside out. Over, and that's day one gone.
starts with a full delivery wide outside off, Fawad jams his bat at it
length ball, rising towards the batsman from outside off, Fawad stays away from it
fuller this time but well outside off, bounces once more before de Kock collects it below his knees
length ball, closer to the batsman this time, but keeps low once again. Beats the outside edge. Again, bounces in front of de Kock
length ball angling in towards the off stumps, defended on the leg side
length ball in the channel, left alone. Hardly any carry for Rabada
length ball around off, stays in the crease and blocks
length ball outside off, pushed towards covers where Maharaj misfields and allows two
length ball around off, a solid front-foot push towards cover

fuller this time, comes forward and blocks. An appeal for lbw but I think it was bat first and also, the impact was outside off. But South Africa want to review it after a bit of discussion. Okay, it's pad first but the impact is outside off. South Africa lose their review
short of length around off, gets on his toes and looks to drop and run but the fielder is alert there
length ball down the leg side, flicks it towards square leg for a single
length ball around off, comes on the front foot, defends it on the off side with soft hands and hares down the other end for a single
length ball, just outside off, moves across and blocks
short this time but there is hardly any bounce in the pitch. Fawad pulls it from outside off towards deep midwicket for a couple
short of length around off, hops and defends on the off side
length ball in the corridor, 137.1kph, left alone
fuller on the pads, flicked uppishly but away from the square leg fielder, the man in the deep cuts it off
fuller on the pads, tucked away to the left of mid-on, calls for a single straightaway and completes it comfortably
length ball outside off, opens the face of the bat to steer it past gully for four. Nortje has overstepped as well
fuller, moving in towards Azhar Ali who has a tendency to fall over at times, but this time, he does well to defend it towards mid-on
too full around off, pushed gently down the ground, Rabada from mid-on puts in the chase. Slides to stop it just inside
length ball around off, stays back and defends
length ball angling in, stays back and looks to defend. An inside edge on to the pads
almost falls over as he looks to tackle this fuller delivery on the pads, flicked behind square leg to take Pakistan to 50
fuller around off, moves towards the off side and defends
length ball at the batsman, turns it towards short midwicket for a single
a bouncer this time, Azhar Ali drops his hands and sways away
fuller on the stumps, coming back late but Azhar Ali just manages to get his bat in front of the pads and flick it towards square leg
extra bounce to rap Fawad on the gloves. It reared up from a good length to have the batsman fending
fuller on the pads, flicked towards square leg
length ball angling in, flicks it behind square leg
length ball in the channel, left alone
fuller this time but on the leg stump, clipped towards deep square leg
a bouncer to Azhar Ali, who had no issues ducking under it
length ball angling in, defended watchfully down the pitch
length ball on the pads, turns it towards backward square leg
length ball in the corridor, left alone
short but way outside off, pulls it down towards short midwicket
short again, this time Fawad pulls it towards deep-backward square leg, rolls his wrists over it
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it on the off side
pushes it towards the left of extra cover this time and gets a quick single
fuller on the stumps, pushed back
starts with a short of a length delivery, defended on the leg side
length ball at the batsman, defended towards short midwicket
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks it on the leg side
was in the air for a bit but safe, gets hit on the gloves courtesy extra bounce, but away from backward square leg, for a single
length ball, just outside off, moves across and works it towards square leg
short of length outside off, punches it towards mid-off from the back foot
around the wicket and shaping in, flicked towards square leg
length ball around off, open the face to steer it towards cover-point
short of length near the rib cage, moves just outside the line of the ball and works it towards fine leg
length ball outside off, pushes it towards extra cover
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on
just clears Bavuma at backward square leg. Was fuller on the pads, whipped uppishly but safe, gets a single
length ball on the pads, flicked towards fine leg for one
fuller around off, nudges it towards covers for a quick single
fuller on the stumps, was looking to work it on the leg side, gets a bit of a leading edge towards covers
fuller but way down the leg side
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards fine leg
length ball around off, a bit of extra bounce, Azahr Ali removes his top hand and defends it down the wicket
length ball outside off, left alone
length ball, just around off, moves across and defends
length ball in the channel, more of a Steven Smith-like leave this time from Fawad Alam
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on
short of length outside off, stays back and steers it behind point
goes for the yorker but it's around fifth stump, Azhar Ali squeezes it out towards extra cover
fuller but way down the leg side, Fawad cannot reach there
length ball on the stumps, pushes it to the left of mid-on for a couple
length ball in the channel, left alone
away from the diving leg slip, length ball on the pads, flicked uppishly but just safe
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
fuller down the leg side, goes for the flick but cannot reach there
length ball on the stumps, looks to flick but gets a thick outside edge towards covers
Fawad is stuck on the back foot. Was a fuller delivery around off, looks to defend but is late. An outside edge bounces towards first slip
length ball outside off, moves across and defends on the leg side with a straight bat
length ball around off, hops and pushes it back towards the bowler
a bouncer but just outside off, Azhar Ali ducks under
rapped on the gloves. Extra bounce from just outside off, Azhar Ali does well to get on his toes and defend it down
full, just outside off, and turning in. Fawad presses forward and smothers a bat-pad defense
full, outside off. He sweeps from outside the line to fine lleg
around the wicket to Azhar. Full on off, and he comes down the ground. Mistimes towards the non striker
full on off, and driven to wide mid off on this occasion
full on middle this time. Tiny press forward, and defended
good length outside off and going in with the angle. Defended off the back foot to the leg side
good length outside off. And defended off the back foot with the full face of the bat
good length on middle, and he quickly shoulders his arms to allow the ball to go down the leg side
full on middle,  and angling into leg. Flicked to square leg, where Bavuma's dive stops the single
back of a length on middle, and he allows the ball to go past his armpits, and down the leg side
good length on the off-stump channel. Fended off the back foot to the leg side
back of a length, outside off. Rides the bounce and blocks it away towards point
full on middle, from around the wicket. Whipped off the front foot to midwicket
he's on the floor trying to sweep this full ball from off stump
full on off stump. Presses forward, and blocks with soft hands
full on middle. And dug out of the blockhole. Ball rolls down to mid on
fullish, just outside off. Azhar softly blocks it away towards the off side
full on off. Hurries onto Azhar, who blocks from under his eyeline
around the wicket to Fawad. Good length ball outside off and angling in. Worked off his hips to the leg side
full outside off, and Fawad shoulders his arms. Lowish carry to de Kock
good length, just outside off. He stays on the back foot and slaps a cut pasts point! The game's first fifty stand
fullish, on middle. Worked off the back foot to the leg side
fullish, on middle. Chooses to flick off the back foot
good length, angling into his pads, and worked to deep backward square leg for a single
half-tracker outside off, and Fawad quickly rocks back and then cuts it square to the point boundary. Gauged the length super early
full outside off and going straight through. Fawad presses forward to defend, but it doesn't turn, and therefore goes past his outside edge
good length, just outside off. Cuts, but mistimed to cover on this occasion

full just outside off, and he gets down on one knee to sweep. Misses the shot, hits the front leg, and squirts away to third man. appeal for lbw turned down since impact was probably outside the stumps
around the stumps to the right-hander. Full on off, and he misses the leg-side clip
full on off, and he turns it with the bat's closed face to deep midwicket, where the infielder's chase is futile. An expensive over from Maharaj
good length on off, from over the wicket. Flicked to fine leg
around the stumps to Azhar. Full on middle. Defended after a big stride forward

full, on off and middle stump. Comes forward to defend, and he defends, but they appeal for lbw. South Africa think it was pad-bat and not bat-pad... and wow, de Kock is convinced enough to review. Replays show that the ball was touching the bat and pad at the same time. TV umpire says 'it's not conclusive whether bat first or pad first' and therefore they will stay with the on-field decision. What's interesting is that South Africa lose another review despite the TV umpire's decision being unconclusive
full just outside off stump. Presses forward and defends to cover point
full on middle. Defended with the full face of the bat, and the ball goes to the leg side
good length on middle, and he misses the flick. Hits the outside of his pad in front of leg stump, and rolls away for a leg bye
full on off stump. Presses forward to defend
full on off, and he goes across the stumps before paddle-sweeping to fine leg
defended off the front foot
good length, just outside off. Rocks back and punches down the ground
pushed away towards over this time
full, just outside off. And dug away to short midwicket
full on leg, and he wants to flick it fine, but misses
full on off, and he comes down the ground to drive to mid on
good length, outside off. Mistimes the cut onto his pads
good length, outside off. Cuts to cover point
full on off, and he comes down the ground to check drive. Goes to mid off
full on middle. Presses forward to block
fullish, outside off stump. Dug out, and it rolls back to the bowler
did that carry? Full ball outside off and he wants to defend but it takes the outside edge! Yeah, it carried, as the ball hit Elgar's left boot before squirting away for two. Dropped
full, on off, and defended
full outside off. Defended with the bat's open face towards cover point
full just outside off. Defends with soft hands with the bent knee to ensure the ball (that stayed low) doesn't go through him
full on off, and he smothers a drive to mid on
length ball, just outside off. Cut away to point
full, on off, and he's down on one knee in a flash to sweep. Thumped to deep midwicket, despite a fielder behind square there, who had no chance
full on off. Presses forward to block it back to the bowler
full outside off stump. Comes down the ground and plays it past the fielder lurking at silly mid off, who jumped to try and avoid being hit
good length, just outside off. Ball stays low, an bottom-edges the cut into the deck
fullish, just outside off. Check-drives towards cover point, rather tentatively
full, just outside off. Comes down the ground and plays it towards mid off
full on middle and leg. Defended firmly off the front foot
full, and quite wide. Azhar lets it go
full on middle and off. Defended to the leg side
full on off, and he comes down the ground to place a drive past cover. Fielder in the deep, Linde, runs across the boundary and tidies up quickly, ensuring it's just oe
full, just outside off stump. Defended back and Maharaj collects
good length, outside off, and cut to point
good length outside off and turning in. Fended off the back foot
good length, just outside off. Punched towards cover
fullish, just outside off. Defends off the back foot
full on middle. He goes onto the back foot an defends late from in front of his pads
good length, outside off. Punched to cover
nudges it into the gap near mid on, and calls quickly for the single. Maharaj isn't happy because he wanted mid on to get there quicker
stopped by mid off
full on leg stump, and he drills it back. Hits Maharaj's hand, but bounces up and knocks Fawad on his helmet. Umpire Dar checks on Fawad, he's okay
spinner has overstepped, yikes! Full outside off and a bit of turn away. Left alone
full on middle and leg. Presses forward to defend towards cover point
full outside off, and pushed towards deep point off the front foot
length ball on middle, and turning into his pads. Nudged to square leg
full on off, and pushed to mid on
full on middle and leg. Pushed back to Linde
full, just outside off, and he guides it towards point
blocked
defended
full on leg, and he comes down the ground and times a check drive to mid on
starts with a fuller delivery around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks again
defended again, this one stayed a bit low
fuller outside off, drives it towards extra cover
tossed up around off, defended
fuller around off, drives it towards extra cover and both batsmen respond early to complete the single
fuller around off, stays back and defends
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short leg
goes back and defends it towards short leg
length ball on the stumps, spinning in, goes back and defends again
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
straighter, just in front of middle and leg, blocked
fuller on the stumps, sweeps it all along the ground towards deep square leg
length ball outside off, pushes it towards covers for a quick single
length ball around off, more of a thick outside edge as Fawad looks to defend. Gets a single to short third man
fuller, flatter and quicker, Azhar is quick to get his bat down
length ball outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
fuller around off, pushes it towards midwicket for a single
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it towards point
fuller around off, pushes it on the off side but Bavuma at short cover makes a diving stop
fuller and wider, a bit of shape away, pushed towards short cover again
length ball outside off, kept low this one. Goes straight as well and beats the bat
fuller and wider, a big stride forward to smother it
tossed up just outside off, goes for the drive but the ball dips at him, finds the inner half and rolls towards square leg
top edge as Azhar Ali goes for the cut, wasn't that short but it went well away from the slip fielder
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on
length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends
length ball outside off, too close to cut. Fawad ends up chopping it into the ground
short of length at the stumps, takes the bottom hand off and defends it towards square leg
fuller outside off, in the channel, left alone. Bounces again just in front of de Kock
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
length ball outside off, defended from the crease
length ball at the stumps, defended from the front foot
length ball around middle, comes forward and blocks
uses his feet, reaches to the pitch and pushes it towards extra cover
skips down once again, blocked this time
fuller on the stumps, goes low and paddles it to the right of short fine leg, the fielder in the deep cuts it off
blocked firmly from the front foot
fuller but way down the leg side, de Kock makes a partial stop but they take a bye
a bouncer from Rabada, Azhar Ali is more than happy to duck under it
length ball outside off, stays beside the line of the ball and defends it away from the body
short of length at the batsman, Azhar does well to counter the extra bounce. Takes his bottom hand off and dabs it towards short midwicket for a quick single
fuller length angling away, Fawad leaves it alone. Bounces multiple times before reaching de Kock
length ball around off, Fawad gets behind it and blocks
length outside off, backs away and looks to punch, but the ball hits the outer half and goes past slip. Brings up his fifty with that couple
uses his feet to push it towards short midwicket
once again skips down, Maharaj bowls it on the pads, defended
fuller around off, defended firmly from the front foot
fuller around off, drives it back towards the bowler
finally a wicket for South Africa. Azhar Ali perishes while trying to play a cut. Too full and too close. The shot wasn't on. Gets a thick outside edge and de Kock pouches it smartly
length ball around off, stays back and defends
short of length, just angling away but it's a slow wicket and Fawad manages to drag it down towards fine leg
length ball outside off, looks to play but withdraws his bat at the last moment
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers
length ball around middle and leg, tucked away behind square leg, off the mark

length ball around off, goes back and turns it towards short leg

just short of de Kock. Was a length ball outside off, holds its line after pitching and fetches the outside edge. But it doesn't carry to the keeper who dives to his right and it took it one-handed on the bounce
short this time but the line is not correct, pulls it down towards fine leg
139.4kph, fuller on the pads, Fawad flicks it uppishly, not for the first time today but it falls just in front of the backward square leg fielder
length ball around off, defended from the crease
fuller around middle and leg, blocked from the front foot
fuller around off and middle this time, dead-batted once more
too full on the stumps, punched back
length ball around off, defended on the off side, looks like Maharaj has overstepped here
fuller around off, looks to block but the ball turns and takes the thick outside edge, rolls towards short third man
full and straight, defended right under his eyes
short of length angling across, Fawad gets low, drops his hands and sways away
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover
a full toss on the leg stump and Fawad almost chips it to short square leg. Bavuma under the helmet there but it lands just short of him
fuller on the pads, this time flicked towards Bavuma
short of length at the batsman, hops and defends it down on the leg side
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
fuller outside off, lunges forward and opens the face for a single to third man
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
fuller on the stumps, defended from the crease
fuller outside off, Rizwan goes low and sweeps it from there towards deep-backward square leg. Gets a boundary
another sweep, this time the line was off stump, the deep square leg fielder cuts it off
132.3kph. A length ball outside off, Rizwan chases it with his hands. Gets beaten
length ball outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, moving away a bit. Left alone
length ball, in the channel once again, shouldered arms
length ball around off, a bit of inswing there for Nortje. Rizwan does well to defend it on the leg side
this one leaves the batsman. A length ball outside off, Rizwan is happy to leave it alone
good length just outside off. Rocks back, and works it towards the leg side
good length, just outside off, and defended off the front foot
works this ball off his pads behind square
full, just outside off. Presses forward to defend it towards silly mid off
full, just outside off. Defends to Markram under the helmet at silly mid off

good length, outside off and turning in. Looks to flick, and inside-edged onto his pads. Ball then goes towards the keeper's left, but de Kock was wrong footed as he was moving to his left at that point
length ball, outside off, and the cut rolls past the slip cordon to third man
good length, on leg stump, and he flicks to fine leg. Moves to 49

full on middle, and he flicks this (with the head falling over) past midwicket. Elgar gives the ball a mighty chase, but goes over the boundary line trying to push it back. Played well, especially with some late swing into his pads
good length, on off. Comfortably length to pull, and he hammers it behind square. Linde dives to flick it back, and Ngidi cleans up thereafter.
back of a length, just outside off. Comfortably blocked off the back foot towards point
on that good-length channel outside off, and nudged off the back foot to point
good length, outside off, and cut in front of square, past the fielder at short mid off turning away
full, just outside off. Smothers it with soft hands off the front foot
tossed up, good length outside off, and he gently cuts past point. Settles for one and that's his first Test fifty technically since all his previous fifties have been centuries
full, on middle, nearly in the blockhole. Defended
full, on off stump. Big stride forward and defended
full on middle stump. Pushed back to Maharaj off the bat's toe end
good length, just outside leg. Swivels to pull but misses
fullish, on off and he nudges a tentatively horizontal-bat defensive shot to the off side
full, just outside off. He allows it to go through to QdK
short and wide, chooses to pull, but can't beat du Plessis at backward square leg
fuller, on leg stump. Rolls his wrists to flick leg side, but there are three fielders inside the circle square there
good length, on off stump. Scurries onto the back foot, and blocks it back to Nortje
full on middle and leg, from around the wicket. Drilled back towards Maharaj
full on middle. Presses forward, and offers the full face of the bat to block
full on middle and leg. Defended to the leg side
full on middle and leg. Nudged to the leg side
full on middle, and driven back to Maharaj. Well stopped on the followthrough
full on off, and he takes a big stride before sweeping to fine leg
fullish, just outside off stump. Big stride forward to defend from under his eyeline
length ball, outside off and angling in. Blocked with soft hands
thumped! Short and wide, but nipping in. Stays on the back foot, and cuts behind point, and this goes racing away for four
full, outside off and coming inwards. Driven down the ground, and this goes to the long-on fence!
full, on off and swinging in sharply. Flicked leg side
full outside off but moving in. Meets it on a driving length, but can't beat the bowler, who stops it on the followthrough
tossed up on off. He goes onto the back foot and works it leg side
yorker length, just outside off stump. Mistimes the cover drive towards mid on
good length, outside off. And Fawad nudges it off the back foot behind point. Looked to defend at first
full on middle. Brings his bat down, jams it next to his pad, and inside-edge flies to the leg side
full, just outside off. Big stride forward and blocked back to the bowler
full outside off, and smothered with the turn to the leg side. Some good turn on this occasion
fullish outside off, and left alone by Rizwan
good length, just outside off. Wants to play at it, sticking his bat out, but it whizzes past his outside edge
good length, just wider outside off stump. Shoulders his arms
good length, just wide outside off stump. Nudged away, square
full and wide outside off stump. Driven well, but can't beat the fielder lurking at cover

lbw appeal, and not given! de Kock and Ngidi look at each other, and the captain asks for a review This was a length ball that pitched wide outside off, but jagged back in, stayed low, and hit him on leg stump. But this is going way down leg, and SA have used up all their reviews
good length, outside off stump,  and turning in. Defended off the back foot
full outside off stump. Reaches out and drives against the turn to cover
full, just outside off stump. Pushed towards mid on
full, just outside off stump. Presses forward and blocks it to the leg side
tosses it up, and becomes a full toss as Fawad goes for an expansive drive. Bat turns in his hand, silly mid off goes scampering, and the shot is sliced behind point for a four
flicks this away to deep midwicket. Wristy shot
back of a length, outside off stump, and straight through to the keeper
yorker length, on off stump. Gets his toes out of the way, and sticks the bat in front to block

into his sixties although that wasn't a convincing shot. Fullish, just outside off, and he looks to defend. But the ball holds its line, takes the outside edge, and runs away fine to the third-man fence
uneven bounce! Takes one hand off the bat handle to try and keep the ball along the ground. Hit on the finger in the process
length ball, outside off, and blocked
full on middle, and flicked to square leg off the front foot
up and over, well almost! Full outside off, and he skips down the ground and hammers a shot over the non-striker. Not off the sweetest part of the bat but enough to get four at long on
good length, outside off and turning away. Makes room to cut and mistimes it to short third man
good length, outside off. Opens his stance and cuts it to point
full on off, and turning in. Driven to Faf at mid on
full, wide-ish outside off. Blocked off the front foot
full, just outside off stump. Presses forward and fends it down the ground
full and wide outside off. Hammers a drive, a bit away from the body, but along the ground to the etra-cover fence
good length, just outside off stump. Covers his stumps and shoulders his arms

edged and taken! And Rizwan's counter-attacking innings comes to an end. Reward for Ngidi as he drops his length, getting it to bounce a bit, and Rizwan's attempt at a poke behind point goes to the left of first slip instead. Dive from Faf, and he's pouched this well
fullish, just outside off stump. He lets it go, and low bounce into the keeper's gloves
good length, on off and angling into the pads. Flicked to fine leg
yorker length, on middle and leg. And flicked behind square leg.
fuller around off, defended on the front foot
length ball at the stumps, blocked again
fuller around off, uses his feet to drive it through covers for four
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-on
length ball around off, looks to defend but is beaten as the ball goes straight on
length ball outside off, defended on the off side
short of length outside off, enough room for Faheem to free his arms and cut it behind point
a thick outside edge this time as Faheem looks to defend. Into the ground and goes past the second slip
fuller around off, looks to hit it through midwicket but loses his balance and the ball rolls towards backward square leg
length ball outside off, stays beside the line and defends
ouch, that hurt. A short of length delivery that kicks off and hits Fawad on the forearm. He drops the bat in pain, the ball lobs towards backward square leg
length ball at the stumps, defended towards short midwicket
flatter around off, gets behind it and blocks solidly
tossed up, defended on the front foot
flatter this time, defended on the front foot
flighted around off, smothered on the front foot
length ball on the stumps, comes forward to block but gets an inside edge towards square leg
short of length outside off, left alone
an outside edge but doesn't carry to the keeper. Kept a touch low as well as Fawad looks to defend. de Kock manages to stop it partially
length outside off, steered with an angled bat past the second slip
nicely pushed through covers, Dean Elgar chases and puts in the slide to keep it to two
length ball around off, stays back and defends
length ball angling in, gets behind it and blocks
length ball outside off, moves across and flicks it towards short midwicket
fuller outside off, drives it towards extra cover
flatter around off, stays in the crease and blocks
length ball around off, works it on the leg side
quicker and fuller outside off, Fawad thrusts his bat at it
driven through covers this time. Was full outside off and Fawad came forward and drove it all along the ground
fuller around off, comes forward and looks to block. A thick outside edge towards third man
down the tack and smashes it over long-on, all the way for six to bring up 200 for Pakistan

a big mix up but Rassie van der Dussen fails to make a clean stop in front of square leg. Was a length ball at the stumps, Fawad was stuck on the back foot and works it on the leg side. Takes a couple of steps down the wicket before seeing van der Dussen sliding across. Faheem was almost at the other end but van der Dussen ended up deflecting the ball away
tossed up, comes forward and blocks
flatter, defended towards short leg
stretches forward this time to drive it through extra cover
fuller on the stumps, blocked
swept this time but cannot beat short fine leg, will get a single though
flighted on off, comes forward and blocks it
flatter on the stumps, turns it towards square leg
fuller, lunges forward to push it towards mid-on
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball around off, pushes it towards short extra cover
length ball angling across, goes for the cut but cannot reach there
length ball angling in off the seam to beat the bat and hit Faheem on the pads. An appeal for lbw denied, and South Africa don't have any reviews left. Had pitched outside leg, replays show
beaten by pace this time, length ball on the pads and hits the batsman high on thigh
beaten on the outside edge this time as he looks to push at this length ball outside off
length ball coming back in off the seam, beats the bat once again. Was heading down though
fuller around off, lunges forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps, pushed back from the front foot
pitched up outside off, drives it but cannot beat mid-off
fuller around off, driven down the ground. Maharaj dives to his left but cannot stop the single
length ball around off, defended on the front foot
too full this time, digs it out towards mid-off
short and pulled down but straight towards Bavuma at square leg
fuller and wider, left alone. Keeps low and bounces once more before reaching to de Kock
fuller on the pads, flicked towards fine leg
length ball on the pads, flicked but cannot beat square leg
length ball in the channel, left alone
goes for the yorker but misses his line a little bit. Ends up bowling down the leg side. Faheem got some bat on it as he looks to clip it away, gets four
fuller around off, lunges forward and drives it towards midwicket
shorter in length this time, stays back and defends
length ball on the stumps, sweeps it behind square leg
fuller on the off stump, looks to push down the ground but it goes straight. The leading edge rolls towards extra cover
flatter on the stumps, goes back and defends
quicker again, Fawad works it towards square leg from the back foot
length ball around off, defended from the crease
short of length and width outside off, Faheem jumps in the air and slaps it through extra cover. Pakistan have now equalled South Africa's total
length ball around off, looks to defend away from the body. Gets an inside edge on to the body
short and pulled away brilliantly, smacked in front of square leg for four

another bouncer, hits Faheem on the helmet as he looks to pull. The ball lobs towards short point. Grassed by the fielder but there was no bat or glove involved. The physio is out though and checking in on Faheem
awkward bounce from short of length outside off, Faheem plays with soft hands to the left of first slip. Lack of pace means it falls well short of the fielder
length ball around off, some turn, defended on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and drives but cannot beat short midwicket
length ball outside off, pushes it towards backward point
flatter around off, defended from the crease
angled across full and wide, looks to drive but gets beaten. He was looking for the turn but it went straight
fuller on the stumps, blocked on the front foot
fuller, just outside off, defended from the crease
short, Fawad goes for the pull but is early into the shot as the ball comes slower off the pitch. Gets hit on the body
short of length outside off, stays back and steers it through covers, charges back for the third and moves into the 90s

dropped. Quinton de Kock has put it down, would have been the 200th wicket for Rabada. Was a length ball outside off, Faheem looked to defend but it moved away and kissed the outside edge. de Kock was late react, went low to his left with one hand and grassed it. And they take a single as well
short of length on the pads, tucked away behind square leg
another short of length delviery, Faheem was looking to play at first but pulls out in the end
fuller on the stumps, defended
length ball angling across, goes back and across and blocks
flatter on the stumps, whipped behind square leg
fuller on the stumps, swept hard behind square leg, Ngidi makes a tumbling, fumbling stop and concedes two
length ball around off, defended on the front foot
length ball around off and spinning in, defended
fuller around off, defended from the crease
length outside off, dabs it down towards first slip
length ball angling in towards the stumps, tucked away towards square leg
length ball around off and middle, defended on the leg side
length ball on the stumps, Fawad looked early into the shot as he looks to defend. Was in the air but well to the left of Rabada
length ball on the stumps, defended towards mid-on
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
short and down the leg side, Faheem goes down and swipes it towards fine leg. The fielder is squarer and they take two
fuller outside off, drives it towards extra cover
an outside edge this time as he looks to defend. Away from the first slip though
and he gets to the three-figure mark with a six. Uses his feet to come down the track and smash it over long-on. His third Test hundred. Does a sajda, while his team-mates give him a standing ovation
back of length outside off, goes for the cut but ends mistiming it towards covers
short of length outside off, defended
short of length once again, this time defended towards mid-on
fuller outside off, goes for the drive but gets an outside edge past the gully fielder
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-off
goes for the pull and misses as the ball angles in from around the wicket. Gets hit on the pads
fuller outside off, driven firmly but cannot beat mid-off
overpitched outside off. He makes room and taps it towards point
yorker length, on middle,  and drilled to mid on for a quick run
full just outside leg stump. Flicked towards fine leg
yorker length, on leg stump. He smothers a drive past the bowler's right to mid off
thrashed! Good length outside off, and Fawad backs away before flat-batting a slap past cover's right for four!
full, and wide outside off. Happy to shoulder his arms
good length, just outside off. Minimal footwork in his attempted punch. Inside-edged onto his pads
length ball, outside off, stays a tad low. Punched off the back foot towards extra cover
put away! Good length ball, wide outside off but angling slightly in. Small step forward and punched square to the deep point boundary
back of a length, angling into him from around the wicket. Pulled ferociously, but protection is there in the deep
fullish, just outside off, and stays low en route to the keeper
full on his toes, and worked with a swipe to deep midwicket
good length, just outside off. Cut to point
full, on off. Presses forward and blocks it down the ground
half-tracker outside off. Punched with the turn to deep extra cover
good length, just outside off, and played off the back foot to cover
