good length, outside off, and cut sharply to deep point
good length ball angling into him from around the stumps. Guided down to fine leg
good length, outside off. Throw his hands at it, and cuts to third man
good length ball outside off. He plays it late after thinking of leaving it. Tapped away towards point
good length, on off. Rocks back and defends from under his eye line
back of a length, on off and angling in. Pulled from near his chest, but mistimed to square leg
full, just outside off. Presses forward and defends
full on middle and off. Pushed it back to Markram
good length, just outside off. Bit of turn away, and cut to point
full, just outside off. Big stride forward and defended
full on middle and leg. Gets his feet out of the way and pushes a drive towards cover
full on middle. Guided with the bat's closed face to mid on
full outside off, and he caresses a drive to cover

just past mid on! That was a chance, but needed something special from Rabada. Faheem drags a pull from outside off stump, but mistimes it. Rabada - at mid on - dived to his right but the ball just eluded him. He's on 47 now
fullish, just outside off. Ball stays a bit low, and his defensive shot takes an edge and rolls away behind square on the off side
good length, just outside off, and he lays a delicate cut to run the ball down to third man
fifty for Faheem as he pulls this behind square, where the fielder cleans up. Pavillion is on it's feet, big smile on Babar
flicks this down to fine leg
full on middle and leg. Defended with soft hands
hundred stand! Uses the angle to whip it off his pads down the leg side for three
fullish, wide outside leg stump. Misses the flick
full on off stump. He sticks his bat right in front of his pads and blocks with soft hands
fullish on middle, but some extra bounce hits him on the arm in front of leg stump

the breakthrough has come! Full on middle, and the flick has gone straight to midwicket! Fawad is disappointed because of how well he struck that, but de Kock got the field spot on. Couldn't keep the ball down, and Ngidi is delighted. Been a difficult day for the SA pacers today. Applause all around as he walks out with yet another Test century

over the stumps to the right-hander. Searing delivery angling into the stump from a good length. Hasan's surprised by the pace but does enough to get bat in front, and gets an edge towards short third man
good length, just outside off. Tapped to cover and they call early for the two
fullish, just outside off. Defended off the back foot towards cover
bends his back with a fast bouncer, but this is wayward. Down the leg side
good length ball, angling in from around the wicket. Wants to flick it behind square, but hits his body instead
fullish on middle and leg. Going down the leg side, just past his pads
worked off his waist to midwicket
good length, just outside off and angling in. Punched back, and the bowler collects on the followthrough
fuller, on the stumps, and drilled past Ngidi. Mid off cleans up
fullish, on off, and he mistimes a drive towards midwicket's right. Gets off the mark
short, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Takes a thick edge, flies over the cordon, and races away for a boundary
fullish, just outside off stump. Defended gently towards cover
off the edge! Full, outside off, and he wants to drive with the straight bat. But it takes a thick outside edge and runs away to third man for four
Hasan drove uppishly to cover and got off strike. Was a little casual taking the run, and could've been run out had the throw been a direct hit
full on off stump. Defended with the bat's closed face to the leg side

Oh dear, Faheem will be disappointed! Nortje bowls a yorker, just outside off, and Faheem did well to get the bat down. The ball takes some back spin after hitting the bat, and then rolls back to dislodge the bails! His 64, though, was entertaining, at a strike-rate of almost 75
full on a stump to stump line, and driven straight back
good length on off and angling in. Flicked past midwicket, but there's protection in the deep. Not the most convincing shot, and now Nauman has the strike. His first ball in Test cricket coming up
good length just outside off, as Ngidi comes around the stumps. Punched rather confidently towards cover point
fullish, on middle, and worked off his pads to fine leg. Off the pads, though, so he must wait for his first run in Testss
fullish, on middle. Defended with soft hands, back to Ngidi, who dives to stop the ball
loud lbw appeal but not given. Full on middle, and it hits him full, but probably sliding down the leg side. South Africa can't review either
back of a length, just outside off. Defended from near his face, but with soft hands. Ball rolls away towards point-ish
back of a length, just outside off. Rides the bounce, guides it in front of point, and those are his first runs in Test cricket!
good length, on off stump. Defended off the back foot.
length ball, angling in, and nudged to midwicket
back of a length, on middle, and the ball soars over his head
full on middle stump. Defended with a big stride forward
full, on off and skidding through. Ali rocks back and defends it back
full on off, and he comes down the ground for a big swing of the bat. Hammered, and lands just in front of mid on who had to put in a dive
full outside off, slightly wider than usual. The cover drive is mistimed towards mid on
full, just outside off. Presses forward and defends well
full and wide outside off. Comes down the track and caresses a drive pasts cover! Nearly goes for four, but Nortje's relentless chase helps him pull it back
good length on middle and leg. Some extra bounce, but defended off the back foot
knee-high full toss on leg stump. Flicked to midwicket, but slightly mistimed
nudged to the leg side
length ball, just outside off. Hasan pulls his bat back, offering no shot
shortish ball, outside off, and he top edges a cut. Falls a few feet in front of deep point
length ball on middle and leg. He gets his body in front of the stumps and blocks confidently
full on off. Hasan wants to defend, and it takes an inside-edge onto his pads before lobbing up in the air. Falls to the left of short leg though

full outside off. Hasan Ali tries to drag a sweep from outside the stumps. But it takes a bottom-edge and rolls back onto the stumps. Maharaj's third wicket of the innings, but wait! Drama. Maharaj has overstepped, barely just, but no ball it is. Hasan survives.
full on off, and driven back to Maharaj
full on middle and leg. Defended firmly off the front foot
full, on off stump. The drive takes an inside edge towards midwicket
full on middle. Wants to defend, but played with hard hands. Lobs up in the air, but falls just beyond Markram at forward short leg

dropped! Difficult chance as Hasan goes for a slog sweep. Top-edged it, in the air for ages, and Faf runs from mid on to try and catch it. But it falls just beyond him, despite the dive. If Faf can't get to it, though, unlikely many others in world cricket can
full, just outside off, and hammered to mid on
full on off. Gets his bat in front of the pads to defend
full, just outside off. Defended with soft hands
full on middle and off. Defended off the front foot again
full on leg. Brings his bat down and blocks
stumps And Pakistan end the day with two wickets in hand. Defends this length ball and the debutant will come out to bat on day three as well.
starts the day off with runs. Back of a length outside off, and punched with the bat's open face to deep point
full, just outside off and moving into off. Drives, and flies off the bat's outside half to extra cover. Another double
full, just outside off, and it's slightly slower from Nortje. Hasan is into the drive a tad too early, and mistimes this to square leg
good length, outside off, and Hasan stands tall to execute a perfect back-foot punch through the covers! 'No power, just timing', exclaims Wasim Akram
good length, outside off and angling in. Firmly blocked off the back foot
that's hit him as this short ball on off sears into middle and leg. Hasan half-ducks, and the ball hits him near the glove. Near the left wrist, replays suggest
hello there! Starts off with a boundary, Nauman. Full, on off and angling away. Sticks his bat out to defend, and it takes the outside edge, past the diving first slip fielder
fullish on off. Looks to defend off the front foot and it takes an outside edge to third man
good length, just outside off, and he fishes outside the stumps. Through to the keeper
good length, outside off, and Hasan flashes hard at this, lofting it over the infield. Two more as deep point cleans up
wicket number 200! Length ball angling in, and Hasan wants to slog leg side. Misses, and the ball crashes into middle stump
full outside off, and he mistimes a cover drive to the off side
defended
edged and rolls away fine for a boundary. Fullish outside off from around the wickets. Wants to drive, takes the bottom edge, and goes between the keeper-first slip gap
good length on middle, and angling into him. Misses the flick, hits the thigh guard, and nearly goes all the way to fine leg for a boundary
good length, just outside off, and defended off the back foot
good length, on middle and leg. Wants to work it leg side, but raps him on the pads
good length, on off, and blocked off the back foot
fullish, on middle, and leg. Flicked to deep backward square leg
fullish, around leg stump. Wants to defend, but misses the shot. Lbw appeal turned down, maybe it pitched outside leg, and replays confirm it
yorker length, around middle and leg. Dug out
length ball on middle, and defended towards the off side
good length, rising delivery outside off and nipping back. Wants to punch, but misses, and through to the keeper
knee-high full toss, as he misses the length for the yorker by a fair distance. Tapped away, and it's a no ball too
flicks this off his pads to deep backward square for two
the runs are flowing! Back of a length on middle, and angling down leg. Simply helps it down past the keeper's left for four. Hundred for Nortje
length ball angling in, and flicked to deep backward square
fulll, just outside off, and he presses forward to defend
back of a length, outside off. Yasir drags a pull from way outside the stumps, and places it towards cow corner. Work for the fielder at deep midwicket, running to his left
tapped gently with soft hands, and Yasir quickly calls for a single
raps him on the pads, and the appeal is turned down because it would've been missing the stumps
Strike rate of almost more than 150! Full outside off, and he plays a beautiful cover drive, off the front foot, and the ball races away
back of a length, on off, and Yasir is forced to duck. That was quick!
fullish, just outside off. Pushes forward, takes the outside edge, and rolls away to third man
full outside off, and this time he brings out the square drive! Flies off the outside edge, and runs away for four more
fullish on off and angling in. Defended
good length, outside off, and cut square to the fielder in the deep
fullish, just outside off, and defended off the front foot
fullish, on off, and flicked off the pads to deep backward square
fullish outside off. Tries to sweep, misses, hits the front leg, but the appeal is turned down. Impact outside off
full, just outside off stump. Blocked
full and wide, and Nauman looks to defend with the turn. It doesn't, and big gap between bat and ball as it goes through to de Kock
defends this full ball with soft hands, off the front foot
full, just outside off stump. Defended towards the leg side
fullish, on off. Tapped gently with the bat's closed face to midwicket for one
full, just outside off. Defended gently off the front foot towards cover
good length, outside off, and he ramps this over the cordon, where Maharaj is fielding at third man
short ball on off, and he uncomfortably defends. Ball pops in the air, but falls well short of KG
good length ball, on off and angling into leg. Flicked to fine leg
Yasir's hurting SA! Full toss on leg, and he swats it leg side off his hips. Nortje dives, but the ball goes through him in the deep
full on leg stump, and he smothers the turn with a front foot defense
full on middle and leg. Defended off the front foot
tossed up on leg and firmly drive to the on side. Stopped by mid on though
good length, on middle. He scurries onto the back foot to defend
fullish on middle and off. Defended. Four and five dots in this over
good length ball, outside leg stump. Misses the flick, hits the thigh pad, and rolls away to fine leg
good length outside off. Jags in after hitting the deck. Defended off the back foot
fullish on middle, and flicked to fine leg for one
fullish, on middle. And pushed to mid off
back of a length, on leg. Pulls, towards the leg side, although it comes off the splice slightly
good length, just outside off and moving inwards. Defended from middle, and tapped towards midwicket
full outside off, bit of drift away before pitching. Defended off the front foot, takes the outside edge, and Nauman calls swiftly for one
hello there! Spinner taking on spinner. Full, tossed up outside off, and he simply hammers a six over long on!
good length, outside off stump. Rocks back and cuts to the gap near deep point for two more. Fifty partnership!
full on middle and leg. Pushed off his pads to the leg side, near square leg
up and over! Full, outside off, and he picks the length early before using the straight bat to clobber a boundary over the bowler's head
fullish, outside off. Turning in from the rough, and blocked off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and angling in around off stump. Defended off the back foot past the non striker
good length, just outside off. Punched off the back foot to mid off
back of a length on off, some extra bounce angling into the stumps. Yasir wants to work it leg side, and a leading edge takes it towards cover instead. Well short of the fielder though
full on middle, and Yasir wants to drive but misses. Hits his pads, but the angle Ngidi bowls from means that would've gone down leg
good length, on off. Defended towards short midwicket
good length, just outside off. And blocked from near his chest
full outside off, and he hammers a drive to mid off

lbw appeal, given, but Nauman reviews anyway. This was a quicker ball, lands just outside off, and he misses the sweep. Hits him in front of off, goes under the bat too and the TV umpire confirms it's three reds. Nauman is out and Pakistan are all out for 378
length ball around off, Markram gets on his toes and punches it through covers, boundary off the first ball of the innings
length, a touch closer to the stumps this time, shouldered arms
length again, this time slanting away from Markram, left alone once more
again in the corridor from Shaheen. Markram isn't interested playing at those
141.9kph, length ball angling away, Markram shoulders arms yet again
back of length around off, gets on the top of the bounce and defends it on the off side
fuller but way outside off, left alone. Rizwan does well to dive to his left and collect it
length ball around off, Elgar is behind it and blocks
length ball around off, defended from the crease once again
length ball around fourth stump, looks to steer it towards point but ends up chopping it into the pitch
fuller outside off and Elgar leans into it, drives it through extra cover. He too gets off the mark with a four
a big shout for lbw but Aleem Dar says no. Was a length ball outside off to which Elgar shouldered arms and got hit on the pads as it nipped back. Wasn't going to hit the stumps though
short of length outside off, punched firmly but straight towards the point fielder
length ball in the channel, left alone
short of length, around middle and off this time, blocked from the back foot
length ball, around sixth stump, Markram ignores it

Ahsan Raza raises his finger but Markram wants to review. Length ball around middle and off, Markram hops and looks to defend but it keeps a touch low and beats the bat. A big appeal for lbw and given. Replays, however, show it pitched outside leg
length ball in the channel, left alone
Length ball, around fourth stump this time, good leave from Markram as another testing over ends
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards fine leg
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball at the stumps, defended again
extra bounce to rap Markram on the gloves. It kicked off from a length on middle and leg, Markram does well to get his bottom hand off and work it fine, just past the diving Rizwan
length ball around off, taps it towards cover-point
length ball on the stumps, once again looked like some extra bounce. Defended
139.1kph, short of length around off, dabs it down square of the wicket on the off side
length ball around off, defended again
short of length around off, gets on the top and drops it down
short of length outside off, drops it on the off side and sprints to the other end
fuller, just outside off, defended
length ball, coming in towards the off stump with the arm, taps it on the leg side. Shaheen has overstepped once again
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
length ball around off, defended on the leg side
length ball on the stumps, tucked away to the left of mid-on
once again extra bounce but Markram does well to play it safely. Removes the bottom hand and closes the face to work it towards square leg
length ball around off, keeps a bit low, defended towards covers
length ball on the pads, turned towards square leg
length outside off, punches it through covers this time, finds the gap and the boundary
short of length around off, stays back and defends it on the off side
length ball, just around off, defended towards extra cover
goes for the short one this time, well-directed as well, Markram drops his wrists and sways away from it
short again but this time on the leg stump, tucked away towards backward square leg
length ball around off, drops it towards covers for a single
length ball around off, defends it towards mid-on and sets off. Another quick single
length ball around off, turns it towards short midwicket and sneaks in another quick single
an inside edge on to the pads. A length ball angling in, looks to punch it through extra cover but fails to middle
length ball around off, defended solidly this time

gets hit on the helmet. Was a short of length delivery, Elgar went for the pull but the extra bounce meant he missed it and got hit on the side of the helmet. The physio is out, and after a bit of checking, Elgar looks fine to continue
length ball around off and middle, defends but almost gets squared up
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball around off, goes back and punches it towards mid-on
length ball around off, defended
short of length outside off, punches it towards extra cover
length on middle and leg this time, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the stumps, whipped towards mid-on
fuller around off this time, lunges forward and blocks
length ball outside off, beats the outside edge as Elgar defends inside the line
length ball around off, defended away from the body towards cover
short of length outside off, stands tall and taps it past the backward point for three
short of length outside off, defended from the back foot
length ball, comes in with the angle to beat the bat and hit Markram on the pads as the batsman looks to flick it away. An appeal for lbw but that was going down
length ball outside off, left to the wicketkeeper
fuller around off, defended from the front foot
fuller outside off, pushes it towards the point region, the fielder is deep and they take an easy single
fuller around off, looks to jam his bat at it, the ball hits the inner half of the bat and then goes on to hit the pads
misfield from Azhar Ali at extra cover costs four. Was tossed up outside off, a big backlift from Markram to smash it straight to the fielder but Azhar didn't even get a hand to it
length ball on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
length ball outside off, defended on the off side
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball in the channel from around the wicket, looks to defended but gets beaten. Once again playing inside the line
135.7kph. Length ball outside off, left alone. Bounces in front of Rizwan and hits him just below the neck
slower ball, fuller outside off, Elgar fails to pick it but does well to open the face of the bat and steer it towards point
bouncer this time, angling down the leg side, ducked under. Called a wide
another short one, this time Elgar takes it on, swivels to pull it down towards deep-backward square leg for a couple
length ball outside off, stays back and defends it towards backward point
tossed up, full toss on middle. Thumped to mid on
full on middle and leg. Carefully blocked off the front foot
full on leg stump, and he smothers it with a front-foot defense
fuller, but outside off and skidding through. Rocks back to block
full, outside off, and turning in slightly. Big stride to defend
maiden to start the session. Defended
full, just outside off from around the stumps. Pushed with the full face of the bat
full, just outside off. And defended towards cover
back of a length, slightly wide outside off. Sways away, drops his hands, and lets it go
good length, just outside off. Bends his knees, stays on top of the ball, and punches it beautifully through extra cover. All timing

in the air, but falls safe! Good length just outside off, and this one gets some extra bounce angling into Elgar as he tries to defend. Hits the glove, and the ball is in the air as it goes to the leg side, but just short of midwicket lurking. Physio running out since the ball crashed into his left hand's little finger
back of a length on off and angling into him. Nudges it from around his throat to the leg side
length ball from outside off and skidding in. Rocks back and fends it towards mid on
beautiful delivery! Tosses it up just outside off, turns away significantly as Markram looks to defend. Classical legspinner's ball

appeal for lbw, and hits him outside off. But will they review? No shot offered Time ran out while they were discussing though. Review not taken. This was a full ball outside off, went straight on as Markram padded it away, hit him outside off, but would've missed the stumps.
full, outside off, and he presses forward to defend
full on middle, stump. Defended
full on middle and leg. Big stride forward and blocked
length ball, just outside off, and pulled towards midwicket
short, wide, and he slaps a cut behind point. Races away for four. But Elgar is in pain due to the left hand
good length ball outside off, and he swivels to pull but only gets air. Ball stays a bit low and goes under the bat to Rizwan
back of a length on off and angling into middle. Elgar is in two minds, whether to pull or duck. Eventually takes his eyes off, with his bat in front of his face. Outside edge towards point
good length outside off. Backs away and punches inside-out through the covers. Two fielders give it a chase
full just outside off, from around the stumps. Defended with soft hands

Elgar's agony ends as Rizwan takes a stunning catch! Full outside off from around the stumps, trying to use the rough. Turns in as Elgar tries to sweep. Bottom-edged onto the pad, the ball pops up, and Rizwan has to dive full-length in front, and takes a catch from outside the popping crease
fuller outside off, lunges forward and blocks
length ball around off, looks to defend, gets the inside edge off the bat
fuller around off, comes forward and smothers
too full this time, pushed towards short cover
pitched up outside off, pushed towards mid-off, another maiden for Yasir
fullish ball just outside off. Rocks back to block, but takes an inside edge towards fine leg
fullish, just outside off stump. Goes onto the back foot, and blocks it from inside the crease
length ball just outside off, and blocked off the back foot towards cover point
good length ball, angling in, and flicked off his pads to deep backward square leg. Team fifty
back of a length, just outside off. Goes onto the back foot, and defends from near his chest
fullish, on off. Covers his stumps and blocks it towards the non striker
fullish on off. Turning slightly away, and blocked off the back foo
full on off. Presses forward to defend. Hits the outside edge, and rolls leg side. Keeps short leg interested
full on middle, with a slip and a gully around too. Defended towards the off side
tossed up, more air this time. Lands on off, and he drives with the turn. Finds the gap between cover and mid off, and comes back for the second
full, but wide outside off. Turning further away, and no shot offered
full ball on off. Looks to defend with the big stride, but it takes an inside edge and flies behind square towards square leg
full on middle, continuing from around the stumps. Pushed off the front foot towards Markram at the other end
good length, just outside off and coming into the stumps. Wants to defend, but the ball takes some extra bounce, and hits the bat handle. Ball flies to the leg side
back of a length, on middle. Confidently pulled to deep backward square leg, where there's a fielder placed
full, on off. Pressed with soft hands towards point, and van der Dussen wants the run. But Markram sends him back. Rassie was halfway down there
good length, on middle and leg. Uses the angle to flick it to the fine leg boundary
direct hit at the bowler's end but they were safely home. Tapped towards square leg, and they scurried across for one
full on off, and big stride forward to block
fullish outside off. Markram skips down the ground and blocks it back
full, just outside off. Presses forward to defend to the off side
good length, outside off. And cut in front of square. Extra cover lurking to clean up
full on middle and leg. Defended off the front foot
good length, outside off. Turning away and shoulders his arms
full outside off. Shuffles forward to defend it towards mid off
full on off stump. Shuffles across the stumps, and defends it towards the non striker
fullish on off and angling into the pads, attacking the stumps. Flicked leg side

full on middle and leg, and the ball stays low! Shuffles to flick, and it hits hs leg. Babar reviews and replays suggest this is missing leg stump. The ball went under the bat, hit the outside of his front pad but ball tracking confirms this is a bad review
good length, outside off and angling in. Stands tall and defends off the back foot

fullish, outside off stump. In the channel, and defended with soft hands. Markram isn't happy because there was someone from the Pakistan contingent walking down the steps, above the sightscreen while Shaheen was running in
full outside off. Reaches forward and defends with soft hands, especially with silly mid off lurking
good length on middle. Rocks back to flick, but uncomfortably played
tossed up on middle. Big stride forward and defended towards the leg side
full on leg, and pushed towards midwicket. Early call for one, and comfortably completed
full on middle. Drives inside out towards cover
full on off. Presses forward and defends, but the ball turning away takes the outside edge to point
full, on off and a bit of movement in. Defended off the front foot
good length, angling in. Flicked to Babar at square leg, and they scamper across for one
full just outside off. Rolls his fingers over this delivery, only 118kph. Defended off the front foot
good length, outside off but angling in with the ball staying low. Markram plays late, bending his knees and playing it quite low. Well adjusted, otherwise he would've been lbw or bowled
full, outside off and reversing in. Defended off the front foot, from in front of off
full on off and middle. Flicked towards midwicket, confidently, but for no run
good length outside leg stump. Turning in, and he rocks back to punch to deep midwicket
full outside leg, and turns across Markram's bat as he goes onto the back foot trying to protect his off stump. Past everything and Rizwan collects it well too.
full on middle and leg. Defended with soft hands
full outside leg stump, and swept well to Hasan at fine leg
good length, outside leg stump and turning into him. Wants to crunch a punch through midwicket, but nearly hit straight to short leg
full outside leg, and he brings his front pad out, with the bat nowhere close. Hits the front leg and flies over silly mid off
good length ball on off, and pushed away towards cover. Off the bat's splice though
overpitched outside off with a bit of reverse. Almost a yorker, and toe-ends a drive back to Hasan
full on middle, and flicked from leg stump to midwicket. Fielder dives to intercept
fullish, just outside off. Shuffles across and blocks it
back of a length, outside off stump. Tapped with soft hands towards point, but no single on offer
fullish, just outside off, and he shoulders his arms. Goes to Rizwan on the bounce.
length ball, spinning across, defended
length again, pitches outside leg, padded away
big turn from outside leg, pads it away once more
length ball, goes back this time and pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller this time, just outside leg, offers his pad once more
fuller, just outside off, goes on straight as van der Dussen shoulders arms
length ball around off, gets behind it and blocks
133kph, length ball around off, defended without any fuss
short of length, a bit wider this time, chases it but the ball keeps low. A play and a miss
fuller on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
length ball outside off, goes back and punches it towards backward point
length ball, just around off, blocked from the crease
length ball outside off, left alone
length, once again outside off, shouldered arms
fuller and closer this time, blocked on the front foot
a wrong 'un, length ball around off and spinning in, flicked in front of square leg
tossed up outside off, smashes it through the off side but Azhar Ali comes in the way at short extra cover
pitched up and Markram once again goes for the drive, was in the air for a while but it didn't carry to Azhar who makes a stop to his left this time
length ball, comes back in. Defended by Rassie van der Dussen
fuller this time, just around off and swinging in, van der Dussen does well to get his bat down in time and keep his pad away
fuller again, just around off, defends it towards covers
pitched up in the line of the stumps, blocked
length ball outside off, defended away from the body
length ball on the stumps, defended on the leg side
length ball at the stumps, goes back and whips it towards mid-on
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller wide outside off, left alone
fuller and closer, defended from the front foot
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
fuller, a bit of a reverse swing in to the batsman, defended watchfully
a touch fuller this time, van der Dussen puts in a big forward stride and blocks
pitched up around off, pushes it towards covers and sets off for a quick single
length ball around off, keeps a bit low. Markram defends it on the leg side
length ball at the stumps, defended towards mid-on
length ball angling in, blocked again
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
length ball in the channel, left alone
fuller around off, flicks it to the right of mid-on for one
tossed up around off, looks to defend but gets a thick outside edge. Into the ground and rolls towards short third man
fuller around off, comes forward to defend but the ball dips and turns to hit the outer half
fuller on the stumps, defended on the front foot
length ball on the stumps, turns it towards backward square leg
fuller around off, pushes it towards short extra cover
length ball on the stumps, blocked
fuller around off, smothered on the front foot
fuller outside off, blocked again
flatter and quicker on the leg stump, van der Dussen was moving across but adjusts well to block it
full on the leg stump, hits it hard but straight towards the bowler
beaten. Markram goes back to defend this length ball on middle and leg and gets beaten on the outside edge as it turns across past
keeps low this time. Length ball around middle and spinning away, Markram gets bat on it and works it towards deep cover
pitched up on off, blocked on the front foot
fuller around off, comes forward and blocked

dropped by Babar Azam at first slip. Fuller around off, Markram once again went for that big drive only to get an outside edge as the ball just dips at him and turns away. It went low to Babar's right who failed to latch on to it. He went with both hands, got his right hand to it but it didn't stick
length ball around off, blocked
fuller on the stumps, dead-batted again
flatter and fuller around off, stays back and blocks
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, pushed towards extra cover
full around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller, defended on the front foot
pitched up around off, defends it under his eyes
short of length this time from Yasir, keeps low but Markram goes back and cuts it through the point region for four
tossed up outside off, comes forward and blocks
fuller outside off, defended towards silly point
length around off, punched off the back foot but there is a fielder half-way to the extra cover boundary
flatter and quicker around off, stays low as well. Defended on the back foot
length ball on the stumps, blocked again
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the stumps, flicked behind square leg for a quick single
flatter and fuller, just outside off, blocked from the crease
fuller on the stumps, defended on the front foot
tossed up full outside off, goes low and whips it through extra cover
length but way outside off, left alone
pitched up on middle and leg. Comes forward and blocks
too full on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
fuller on the pads, nudges it towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps, keeps a bit low as well. Blocked
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the pads, moves across and flicks it towards square leg
fuller around off, defended on the front foot
length ball on the stumps, a hint of turn away from the batsman but blocked without any discomfort
looked like a googly but pitched short outside off, goes back and drags it towards midwicket
fuller on the stumps, was looking to play on the leg side but uses soft hands to open the face slightly to defend it on the off
fuller outside off, padded away this time
length ball spinning in from outside leg, offers the pad once again
flatter, just outside off, stays back and taps it towards cover-point
length ball on the stumps, defended on the front foot
fuller around off, pushed towards extra cover
length ball around middle and spinning away, defended watchfully
fuller on the stumps, blocked again
too full around middle and leg this time, blocked
fuller, just outside off, lunges forward and blocks

a direct hit at the wicketkeeper's end. And they are going upstairs. Was a length ball on the stumps, van der Dussen nudged it towards short fine leg and called for a quick single. Markram was quick to respond and makes it comfortably
good length, outside off. Turning away, and he cuts the half-tracker to deep extra cover
full on middle. Defends it towards the leg side, off the front foot
tossed up outside off. Turns slightly away, he shoulders his arms
good length on off. Bit of legbreak, and he makes room before punches to cover
flighted, full and wide, and pushed to cover
full on middle. Skidding through, forcing van der Dussen to rock back and flick it to the leg side
good length, just outside off. Rocks back and firmly blocks it towards cover
fullish, just outside off stump. Defended firmly back to Shaheen
good length outside off, and tapped off the back foot towards point for a jogging single. But he's overstepped
length ball, on off and angling in. Flicked towards square leg
full and wide outside off. Takes a stride, and shoulders his arms
good length, just outside off stump and angling in. Defended off the back foot towards cover
full on leg, and flicked behind square, to fine leg for one
full on middle. Big stride forward and blocked back to Yasir
full on middle. Another big stride to the pitch of the ball. And blocked towards cover
good length outside off stump. Turns the other way, not sure if that was on purpose or hit the crack though. Cut off the back foot to deep point
half-tracker, on off, and he's quick to spot the length. Stays low, rocks back and pulls to the cow-corner fence
full outside off stump, and presses forward to defend towards cover
that was a rare expensive over from Yasir. Good length ball on off has been flicked away to deep midwicket. Hasan, from mid on, gives it a chase to stop the boundary
full just outside off, and driven to cover, but stopped
full on off, and defended off the front foot
full outside off, and he wants to play the cover drive. Inside-edged towards mid on though
fullish, just outside off stump. Pushed back towards mid off
a well struck cover drive off the front foot, but excellent commitment from Babar at cover to stop a boundary. Fifty stand
yorker length, on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket. Calls early for the second run, and comfortably done
full on off and turning away. Defended
full on off stump, and blocked away back to the bowler
full on off, and blocked
full on off again. Defended off the front foot
full on leg, and confidently flicked behind square, where two men in the leg side scamper across. Three taken
good length outside off. Turning away and flicked square to the off side
a square drive past the infield, and races away for four behind point
good length on middle and leg. Defended off the back foot
fullish, wider outside off and angling further away. Left alone
full on middle and leg. Flicked behind square, with quick hands, to deep backward square leg
fullish, on middle and leg. Defended towards cover with the bat's face open
good length, on middle and leg. Flicks it behind square, to backward square for one
good length outside off stump. Turning further away, and cut in front of square on the off side
full, on off stump. Big stride forward to defend
full on middle and leg. Turning in, and played to the leg side
good length outside off, and turning in. Punched to mid off for a quick run, and they race for one, but it's a direct hit! Markram isn't too worried and replays confirm he was well in
good length outside off, and turning away. He rocks back and looks to muscle a short-arm jab to the leg side. Stopped inside the circle
full outside off stump, and drilled to cover
around the wicket again. Good length on middle, and angling in. Flicked to midwicket
uppish and he puts this full ball over cover, with the ball racing away for four. Sweet sound of the bat, and moves to 49
full on middle, and he brings his bat down in front of the pads. Inside-edge to square leg, and that's his fifty!
good length, on middle, and angling into his pads. Flicks gently to the gap behind square, near fine leg
full, outside off and he presses forward defends it back to the bowler
full on middle. And he wants to defend towards mid on, but the outside edge takes it to point instead
around the stumps, full on middle. Defended straight back
good length outside off. Rocks back and tapped towards cover point
full, on off stump. Big stride, defended, and the ball rolls away to cover
full on middle. Defended firmly, coming onto the front foot and showing his full face of the bat
full on leg. Tapped towards the fielder at midwicket
full on middle. Big stride forward and blocked back to Nauman
full on off stump. Rocks back and punches towards the non-striker. Nauman shuffles to his right and intercepts
full, just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot towards cover
full on middle, and flicked off the front foot towards midwicket
good length, outside off, and punched to cover off the back foot
exquisite shot! Full on leg, and Markram lifts his back leg before flicking this gloriously through midwicket
fullish, just outside off. Defended back
good length outside off. Reverse into Markram slightly. Wants to punch straight, but inside-edged to midwicket
tossed up, on his toes near leg stump. Thumped to mid on, and oh dear overthrows! Shaheen aims at the bowler's end, doesn't get the direct hit, Yasir's dive backing up can't stop the ball either
full around off stump, and he defends off the front foot. But the ball zips through, hits his front leg and they appeal for lbw. Not given, and they don't review. Maybe there was an inside edge?
full just outside off stump. Big stride forward to mitigate the turn. Defended
good length, on off. Skids through, and fends it away to cover
full on middle, and driven towards cover's right
full on middle and leg. Defended off the front foot, and takes the outside edge to roll away to cover
full, on off stump. Presses forward to defend back past the bowler
fullish outside off, and he defends off the front foot towards cover
full on middle, and swinging into his pads. Guided to fine leg for one
full, slower ball, wide-ish outside off. Check-drives, adjusts late after seeing that it was the slower delivery
full on off, and swinging in. Keeps the bat low and taps it with the movement to the leg side. He's overstepped though
full on off and he drives with the bat's open face, past cover. Azhar has to give it a chase, and slides across the grass near wide long off to stop the boundary
even better! Pitched up, in the slot, brings the bat down straight, and hammers it back past the bowler
full, just outside off. Presses forward to defend
length ball on off, and he defends off the back foot with soft hands because silly mid off is lurking
full outside off, and he pushes hard at this, and goes through silly mid off's legs
full on middle and leg. He shuffles across, tries to flick fine, but it hits his pads. Past the keeper, and first slip scampers across to intercept
full, outside off. Big reach forward to defend, and inside-edged to square leg
good length, on leg. Worked off his pads to square leg
full on off and swinging in. Defended off the front foot towards cover
good length, on off and Rassie uses the angle coming in to paddle a pull along the ground behind square for four
length ball, angling in from outside off. Defended towards the leg side
full, just outside off. Ball stays slightly low, and defended
full, just outside off, and defended towards cover
appeal for lbw as the ball goes between bat and pad and hits the front leg. But not given. This pitched just outside off, and moved in, but perhaps inside-edged onto the legs
full, just outside off stump. And pushed back towards the bowler
full, on off stump. Blocked with a big stride
fullish, wide outside leg stump, but turning into his pads. Padded away
full outside leg stump, and padded with the turn
great ball! Full, just outside leg stump. And Markram puts his front leg outside leg to try and pad it, but it turns sharply, and goes past the bat and even wide past off stump!
good length ball outside leg stump. Markram blocks his stumps and pads it away

full just outside off and moving in. Driven, back past the bowler, comes for the second run, and that's his fifty! Elgar, de Kock etc are on their feet, clapping him on that effort. But the job's far from over, you'd think
full on middle and leg. Uses the wrists to flick it square, very hard, forcing the fielders to put in a futile chase
good length, just outside off, and tapped with the bat's open face to point. They scamper across for one
defended off the front foot
good length, just outside off. Stands tall and blocks it with the full face of the bat. Once more, overstepped
full on middle, and defended back to the bowler
full on off, nearly a yorker. Tries to dig it out, gets the inside-edge down to fine leg. And that's drinks
fuller on the stumps, Markram comes forward and drives it inside out through extra cover, was in the air for a while but safe
length ball outside leg and spinning in, padded away
length outside leg once again, kicked away once more
further outside leg stump, covers the stumps and lets it go through to the keeper
length ball on the leg stump, tucked away towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and smothers it

this one keeps low and hits just above the knee as Rassie looks to pull and misses. An appeal for lbw and given out by Dar but Rassie wants to review it. And replays show it was just missing the leg stump
an outside edge this time as van der Dussen looks to defend this length ball outside off. But the edge falls well short of Rizwan
length ball outside off, defended towards covers
length ball on the stumps, keeps low, taps it towards square leg
this one kicks off a bit from a length outside off, van der Dussen was looking to defend it, gets hit on the glove

127kph, a bit of extra bounce once again, or may be van der Dussen is expecting all balls to stay low now. He's surprised but does well to open the face of the bat to steer this length delivery between the gully and the keeper. South Africa are in lead now
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and defends
fuller outside leg, padded away this time
flatter and quicker on the leg stump, keeps low as well. Well defended

Markram is caught in two minds. Was looking to pad it away first before deciding to defend but it's too late and gets hit on the pads. An appeal for lbw but denied. Pakistan think of a review but it pitched outside leg I think. Replays confirm the same
length ball on the pads, flicked against the spin through midwicket. Hasan Ali puts in the chase and the slide to save one run for his team
length ball outside off, padded away
length ball angling in, defended from the crease
length ball outside off, defended on the off side
short of length around off, gets behind it and blocks
extra bounce from a length on middle and leg. Markram takes off the bottom hand and works it towards square leg
length ball outside off, stays leg side of the ball and punches it back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it through covers. Hasan Ali with the chase to keep it to two
fuller outside off, padded away
length outside off, padded away once again, the ball goes towards slip after brushing Rizwan's gloves
length on the pads, flicked towards square leg
fuller, just outside leg, van der Dussen offers the pad
similar line, comes forward and lets it hit the body
fuller on the stumps, lunges forward and dead-bats it
length ball angling in, blocked
length again, on middle and leg, comes forward and blocks
a touch fuller around off and middle. Stays in the crease and blocks
length outside off, stays beside the line and taps it towards cover-point
length ball in the channel, angling in. Left alone
a touch fuller, just outside. Keeps low but Markram bends to get his bat down in time
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
tossed up outside off, blocked on the front foot
fuller around off, lunges forward and dead-bats it
fuller on the pads, defended easily
fuller around off, nudges it towards extra cover
tossed up outside off, defended again
starts with a loosener, short and wide outside off, Markram goes back and cuts to the right of the point fielder
short again, keeps a bit low this time. Cut away towards deep extra cover this time
tossed up around off, lunges forward and blocks
fuller outside off, stays back and steers it towards deep cover
tossed up around off, blocked on the front foot
length ball around middle and leg. Comes forward and defends
fuller around off, comes forward, gets low and blocks
fuller outside off, <s>comes down the ground and smashes it over the bowler's head</s>. Comes forward and blocks on the off side
length outside off, left alone watchfully
length ball around middle, blocked from the front foot
fuller and wider, drives to the left of mid-off
fuller on middle and leg, turned on the leg side from the front foot

Yasir Shah snares van der Dussen. Tossed up around off, slower in the air. The batsman comes forward to defend with soft hands but the ball dips at him and goes towards silly mid-off after hitting the middle of the bat where Abid Ali takes it with both hands and a smile
nearly loses his leg stump. A length ball on the leg stump, moves across to flick but misses. The ball almost clips the leg stick
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
length outside off, slower in the air, left alone

given lbw by Dar but du Plessis has gone for the review straightaway. Fuller on the leg stump as du Plessis open up to play it on the leg side. But the ball spins across to beat the bat and hit the back leg. A huge appeal and the finger goes up. No bat involved but replays show the ball pitched just outside leg. I think it would have missed the off stump as well
a googly but pitching well outside off. Too full also. du Plessis blocks it carefully
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
pitched up around off, a big stride forward to block it
length ball around off, defended on the front foot
length ball around off, defended again
fuller and a touch wider, leans into the forward defence
fuller around off, dead-bats it after a big stride
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket, Nauman chases but fumbles and allows a second run
fuller on middle and leg, driven inside out towards mid-off
tossed up around off, comes forward and waits before defending it
too full this time, defended on the front foot
length outside off, goes back and punches it through covers
length ball around off, goes deep in his crease and defends
fuller on the stumps, drives inside out towards mid-off
fuller outside off, pushes towards covers off the front foot
flatter around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket for one
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, defended

dropped. Was a length ball around off and middle, Faf was on the back foot, looking to defend but pulls out the bat at the last moment. Gets an outside edge that finds both keeper and slip unawares and goes between them
length ball on middle and leg, defended back
fuller outside off, looks to defend but it spins away
length ball around off, stays back and blocks

gone! Flatter on the stumps, du Plessis plays back and misses the straight one. Gets rapped in front. An appeal for lbw and a simple decision this time for Aleem Dar. Was hitting the middle of the middle stump
fuller around off, defended on the front foot
length ball outside off, and spinning away, left alone

silly mid-off in action once again. This Test has suddenly taken a different shape. Was a length ball outside off, Markram came forward to block but wasn't to the pitch of the ball. The extra bounce means the ball hits the shoulder of the bat and lobs towards Abid Ali, who takes his second catch of the innings
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball around off, defended on the off side
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-off
fuller around off, pushes at it, a thick outside edge between the second slip and silly mid-off
length ball around off, goes back and blocks
length ball on middle and leg, Maharaj goes deep and blocks
length ball around off, defended
a low full toss around off, pushed towards extra cover
length ball on middle, goes back and blocks
length ball around off, defended on the back foot
just away from the diving backward short leg. Fuller on the pads, looks to defend but gets inside edge on to the pads that goes behind square
length ball at the stumps, defended
fuller outside off, comes forward and blocks
length outside off, uses his feet to get closer to the ball and blocks
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it on the leg side

what a start to the day! Was a length ball around off, that one kept low and went underneath Maharaj's bat to rattle the off stump. There was a bit of shape away as well. Hasan Ali brings out his trademark celebrations as South Africa lose their fifth wicket
length ball in the channel, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone by Bavuma
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks

almost played on. Fuller and wider outside off, Bavuma threw his hands at it with feet rooted to the crease. He got an inside edge past the stumps. A single to fine leg takes him off the mark but he could have been easily back in the hut there
length ball angling away from de Kock, shouldered arms
tossed up on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
fuller on middle and leg, a bit of spin away as Bavuma looks to defend, gets a thick outside edge on the off side
flatter and quicker, defended from the back foot
goes down on one knee and laps it from outside off towards fine leg
length ball on middle and leg, turned towards square leg
length ball around off, stays back and defends solidly
fuller, angling in, flicked towards short midwicket. Hasan Ali has overstepped here
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off
a touch fuller, a tentative push from de Kock just in front of the point fielder
a low full toss outside off, bunted towards mid-off
length ball around off, stays back and blocks with a horizontal bat
fuller around off, a bit of a shape in, looks to defend on the off side but the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards short midwicket
fuller outside off, drives it towards mid-off

de Kock goes back. South Africa in deep, deep trouble here as Yasir Shah snares another one. Was a tossed up delivery in the rough, de Kock went for the flick but got an inside edge on to the pads, and the ball went to the left of short leg, where Abid Ali showed great reflexes to grab it with both hands. His third catch of the innings
length ball around off but spins down the leg side
tossed up outside off, Linde comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off

spins back in from the rough as he looks to flick. The ball lobs towards silly mid-off off the pad and a loud appeal. The umpire is not interested. It would have missed the stumps but I think the appeal was more for the catch
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball outside off, Bavuma looks to push at it and gets beaten
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
short of length at the batsman, gets behind it and blocks
length ball around off, punches it towards extra cover
swinging in this time, flicked by Bavuma. Was in the air but well short of square leg
a bit of misfield allows Bavuma the single. Was a length ball around off, he punched it towards covers
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
length ball, goes back and works it towards midwicket, and they sprint back for the second
length ball in the channel, left alone
fuller on the stumps, blocked
tossed up around off, leans forward and blocks
flighted outside off once more and Bavuma is happy to defend it
too full outside off, Linde jams his bat and opens the face to steer it between slip and gully
length ball in the channel, left alone
fuller outside off, pushed towards covers
short of length outside off, Linde pulls it uppishly towards deep backward square leg, 200 comes up for South Africa
fuller and swinging in, Bavuma flicks it uppishly behind square leg and collects two
fuller on the pads, flicked towards square leg, straight towards the fielders this time
fuller in the rough, comes forward and blocks
shorter in length this time, Linde goes back and defends
length ball spinning, flicked away towards deep square leg
shorter this time, Bavuma drags the pull towards deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, swept hard and manages to hit it between three close-in fielders on the leg side, beats the deep-backward square leg as well
length ball spinning on the pads, flicked towards backward square leg
strays down the leg side first up, a bit of a fumble by Rizwan but no run taken
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards the left of fine leg
length ball angling in on to the pads, looks to flick but misses. The ball brushes the pads and dribbles behind the stumps, Rizwan makes the tumbling stop
swinging in from outside off this time, Linde looks to drive but gets an inside edge on to the pads
short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards extra cover
tossed up outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover

wasn't in complete control of the cut but he gets away. Short of length outside off from Yasir, Bavuma rocks back and cuts it past the diving backward point. Was in the air for a while but well short of the fielder
looks to repeat the shot but the length is a touch fuller this time, ends up chopping it into the ground
length ball outside off, left alone
length outside off, goes back and cuts it in front of cover this time, only a single
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
fuller on the stumps, coming in with the angle, pushed towards mid-on
length ball around off, a hint of inswing. Bavuma comes forward and defends it around the front pad
length ball around off, stays in his crease and blocks
fuller on the pads, flicked in front of square leg, a tumbling stop there but the batsmen take a run
Play and a miss. Length ball outside off, pushes at it but the ball moves away
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
a touch shorter this time, comes forward and blocks again
short of length, goes back and cuts it towards deep-backward point, and they come back for the second
length ball at the stumps, defended from the back foot
lunges forward and defends this full delivery on the off side
flatter and quicker this time, cuts it in front of the stumps for a single towards the point region
fuller outside off, leans forward and pushes it towards extra cover
length ball in the channel, left alone
length ball in the channel, left alone
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends it square of the wicket
fuller around off, Bavuma pushes it past the bowler with the full face, and comes back for the second

a thick outside edge goes between the slip and the gully. Was an attempted yorker but wide outside off, Bavuma took it on the full and looked to drive through covers but failed to middle it. He won't mind the result though
length ball spinning on the pads, flicked towards backward square leg
fuller on middle and leg, Bavuma goes low and paddles it fine for a couple of runs
too full around off, defended under his eyes
fuller outside off, Bavuma looks to push defend on the off side but the ball goes straight. An inside edge to the left of short leg
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
fuller on the pads, flicked towards square leg
nudged to midwicket
slightly full, and pushed towards cover off the front foot
good length on middle, and angling down leg, but Bavuma closes his bat's face and runs it down fine for a useful four
full outside off. Wants to drive through covers, but inside-edged to the midwicket
full on middle, and defended
full outside off stump,and he plays a square drive, with the turn to point
fullish just outside off stump. Skids through, and blocks off the back foot
full outside off and turning in. Presses forward and blocks it leg side
fullish, on off stump. Turning into him, and takes the pad before rolling leg side
full, just outside off stump. And defended down the ground
good length, outside off, ball stays a bit low. Misses the cut through to Rizwan
mistimes a drive towards cover point
full, wide-ish outside off. Big stride forward and shoulders his arms
drops his length slightly, good length outside off, and blocked off the back foot
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot
good length outside off, and he bends his knees to crunch a square cut. Finds the fielder though
good length, outside off and skidding through. Wants to defend off the back foot, and takes the outside edge towards first slip
tossed up just outside off stump. Stride to the pitch of the ball and blocked
good length, just outside off, and defended
good length, outside off stump. Skidding straight through, and blocked towards the off side

Inside edge flies to leg slip! The fielder was there for the flick, but instead gets a catch via the drive. Flighted outside off, wants to drive, but takes the inside-edge and flies to the right of leg slip. Nauman strikes, Linde's 29-ball stay ends

Inside edge flies to leg slip! The fielder was there for the flick, but instead gets a catch via the drive. Flighted outside off, wants to drive, but takes the inside-edge and flies to the right of leg slip. Nauman strikes, Linde's 29-ball stay ends. And Butt's making it a habit, of taking some screamers
good length, outside off and angling in. But wide enough from the stumps, allowing Bavuma to shoulder his arms
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot to the off side
full, just outside off stump. Big stride forward and blocked
full outside off, bit of movement inwards but he shoulders his arms comfortably still
good length, just outside off stump. Rocks back and blocks towards cover
full just outside off, and brings the full face of the bat down to drive to mid on
full, outside off and a bit of drift landing in. Defended towards the off side
full outside off stump. Presses forward, nudges it to cover point, and the new man gets off the mark
full on off, and turning away as Bavuma's front-foot block takes an outside edge to third man
fullish, on off. Big stride forward and blocked
full on off stump. Big stride forward and meets it firmly off the front foot
full on middle, a bit of loop, and blocked away to the leg side. Dug away, in fact
good length on middle and leg. Nudged to square leg
good length on off and angling away. Wants to defend, but goes the outside edge to the keeper
good length, on middle and leg. Wants to defend, but some extra bounce makes it come off the bat handle
fullish, on middle, and blocked away to the off side
full on middle. Check-drives it past the non-striker to mid off
fullish, just outside off stump. Blocked off the back foot to the off side
full on middle. Big stride forward to defend, but inside edged towards short leg
full on middle. Defended off the front foot, played from under his eyeline
full on off, and he paddle sweeps to fine leg
full on off from over the stumps. Defended, with soft hands, off the front foot

in the air, and dropped at deep midwicket! Hasan Ali the guilty man. Full on off, and he tries to clear long on, but it goes further to the leg side. Hasan Ali got under it, but the ball swirls and falls in front of him while he dives forward

Hasan Ali's happier than Nauman Ali! A big hug between the two Alis as they celebrate Rabada getting clean bowled. Full outside off, in the rough there. Rabada tries to drive, but big gap between bat and body. Turns, and crashes into middle and leg stump
good length, outside off stump. Cut to point
good length, on off and skidding through forcing Nortje onto the back foot. Defended to the leg side
full just outside off, and defended
full on off stump. Blocked towards the off side
defended
full on off, and this one goes straight through. Presses forward, and blocks it away to the off side
full outside off stump. Turning a bit away, and pushed to the off side
hands the strike back to Nortje. Paddle sweeps this full ball to fine leg. Could've played it squarer and tried for two though, but this was played fine
full on middle and leg. Skidding into his pads, and blocked towards short leg
full outside off, bit wider, turning away, and left alone

lobs away to point! Full on off, and Nortje wants to crack it towards midwicket. But it turns away, takes the leading edge and goes in the air to the safe Fawad. Not easy playing against the turn as a tail-end batsman
full on off and defended. Outside edge rolls away to third man
full outside off, and turning away. Blocked off the back foot
single taken to mid on, as he flat-bats a half-tracker for one
full outside off and turning away. Left alone
full, on middle. Pushed to the leg side
full on off, and he gets down on one knee to sweep this fine
full, on off stump. Defends, and inside edged off his bat and through his legs
full on off stump. Defended back
full on middle and leg. Defended back to Nauman

appeal for lbw, and given! Five for on Test debut Or is it? Bavuma reviews, he might as well. Full just outside off and angling in. Bavuma tries to sweep but misses, and it hits the inside-half of his front leg. UltraEdge says there is no bat involved. Ball-tracking says impact in line, hitting middle stump and what a wonderful moment for Nauman Ali! The 12th Pakistan bowler to take a five-wicket haul on Test debut. All smiles for him. Does the sajdah to celebrate the achievement. Pakistan need 88 to win
good length, outside off stump. Moving further away and left alone
good length, just outside off stump. Shoulders his arms, through to the keeper
good length, outside off stump. Shoulders his arms and leaves it alone
full and wide outside off stump. Crunches a drive, but has to wait to get off the mark. Stopped at cover
fullish, some extra bounce, and he looks to defend. Nearly hits his glove, but comes off the handle
full and wide, just outside off left alone. Maiden over
fullish, on off, and he presses forward to defend
good length, on off stump. Nudged to the leg side
good length, on off stump. And blocked away
off the mark rather a bit luckily. Good length ball outside off, and he sticks his bat out to punch. Thick outside edge, and past second slip for four
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot
full on middle, and wants to flick behind square. Misses, raps him on the front leg, and rolls away to the leg side
fullish, just outside off stump. Presses forward to defend, but takes the inside edge to the leg side
fullish outside off. A bit wider outside off, and he reaches forward away from his body to defend
good length, on middle and leg. Flicks, but goes down the leg side with no connection
back of a length, on off, and a bit extra bounce. Gets away
good length, just outside off stump. Blocked off the back foot after shuffling across the stumps
good length, just outside off. Stays on the back foot and defended
length ball, just outside off. Opens the bat's face to run it fine, but guides it to point eventually
fullish, on off stump. Defends off the front foot, back to the bowler
full just outside off. Wants to drive, commits to the shot, but takes the outside edge towards third man once again
back of a length, outside off, bends his back for this ball. But the batsman simply offers no shot
good length, outside off stump. Offers no shot once again, allowing it to go into the keeper's gloves
good length ball, anglingi onto his body. Tiptoes it and flicks it behind square to fine leg
good length, just outside off stump. Blocked off the back foot
fullish, just outside off. Presses forward to defend to mid off
full on off, and driven to mid on
good length, on middle and off. Defended back to the bowler
fullish, on off, and worked to the leg side
full, just outside off. Presses forward and defended with soft hands
fullish, just outside off stump. Blocked away to the off side
good length, wide outside off. Rocks back and cuts in front of square for four!
good length, outside off stump. Rocks back again, and he cuts it to deep point. Carbon copy shot
good length, just outside off. Shuffling across the stumps, and blocked back
good length on off and middle. Some extra bounce, going down the leg side to the keeper
good length, just outside off stump. And he shoulders his arms
worked away to the leg side off the back foot with the ball seaming in

ball stays low, and an appeal for lbw! A unique lbw appeal, because it actually hit his back. This was a good length ball that didn't bounce as much. Butt ducked, but the ball hit his body. Umpire says not out, but de Kock reviews. Looks like this was going down leg. Quite a Tendulkar-McGrath type lbw appeal
glorious! Full on off, bit of seam movement inwards, and he drives this with the full face of the bat, past Abid, for four to long on
Abid chops on. Was a length ball outside off, but it kept low. Abid Ali went to punch it through the off side only to get an inside edge on to the pads and it rattles the stumps
fuller and swinging in, flicked towards midwicket to get off the mark
fuller outside off, defended with a straight bat
full again, on the stumps, defended once again with the full face
length, around fifth stump, watches it all the way into de Kock's gloves

Nortje snares another one. That's a loose shoot from Imran Butt. It's not that full. It's away from him. And he went at it without any feet movement. Got a healthy edge to de Kock' right who takes at knee height. Can South Africa pull off something magical here?
an outside edge but luckily for Azhar it dribbles through the slip and gully. Was a length ball at the stumps, Azhar Ali looked to play on the leg side but closed the face of the bat a tad too early
length ball but way down the leg side, ignored
glorious shot. You can watch it all day. Was a touch fuller from Rabada but not a half-volley. Azhar Ali took half a step forward and presented the full face to send it between the bowler and mid-off
kept low this one, a length ball just outside off, Azhar Ali does well to get his bat down in time
length ball around off, blocked from the crease
another outside edge but lands short of the point fielder. This one bounces extra from a length around fourth stump but Azhar Ali does well to take the bottom hand off
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
back of length around off, defended on the off side
144kph. A touch fuller around middle and leg, comes forward and defends

short outside off, Babar drops his hands and sways away. Luckily for him the line is well outside off as it doesn't bounce as much. Had it been straighter would have hit him on the body. On the bounce to the keeper
short of length around off, defended towards covers, Azhar Ali wanted a single but a loud call of no from Babar
length ball angling in, Babar arches bat a little and punches it through covers, gets a couple
an attempted bouncer but down the leg side. Doesn't rise as expected. Azhar Ali ducks under
fuller on the pads and clipped away behind square leg. The fine leg fielder cuts it off
fuller around off, Azhar Ali was late to react. Half a step forward to push it towards extra cover
fuller around off, defended on the front foot
fuller around off and angling in, blocked again
length ball in the corridor, Azhar covers his stumps and watches it go to the keeper
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
goes for the yorker but just misses his mark. Full on the stumps, Babar jams his bat at it
now this one keeps low. Length ball in the line of the stumps, Babar is watchful and brings his bat down just in time
again keeps a touch low. Length ball at the stumps, Babar keeps it out though
length ball, just outside off, stays beside the line and defends
short of length outside off, taps it towards point
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
length ball outside off, punches it towards extra cover
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball outside off, punched on the up through covers and they come back for the second
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
extra bounce from a length. Was in the line of the stumps but Azhar does well to dab it down
full-ish one on the stumps and it keeps low. Babar was on the back foot but does well once again to keep it out
too full on the pads and flicked away through midwicket, the mid-on fielder puts in the chase to save one run
length ball around off, taps it towards mid-on
fuller around off, pushes it on the off side but cannot get past silly mid-off
short of length on the hips, tucked away around the corner
this one keeps low. Was a length ball outside off, Azhar went for it but it went under the bat, on the bounce to de Kock
length ball around off, gets behind it and blocks
length outside off, taps it towards cover
length ball outside off, defended

length ball outside off, Babar gets on the top of the bounce and uses his wrist to flick it from there through midwicket and the timing and placement are such that it beats the fielder to the boundary
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it with his head over the ball
length, in the corridor, Babar leaves that alone
length ball outside off, taps it towards cover-point
fuller on the stumps, presents the straight bat and collects one as the mid-on fielder makes a sliding stop to his left
length ball but down the leg side, Babar fails to connect the flick

Babar Azam cover drives. The result is a four. Close your eyes and imagine. Now open and read this if you feel like. It was fuller and wider outside off, Babar planted his front foot forward and creamed it through the offside ring
straying on the pads this time and Babar has flicked it fine, four more to the Pakistan captain
Nortje corrects himself. A length ball outside off, defended on the off side

stars with a short of length delivery on middle and leg, Azhar Ali is happy to flick it past the square leg fielder and by the time a tired Norjte from fine leg comes across and sends the throw in, the batsmen have run three
short of length outside off, punched firmly but cannot beat the cover fielder
length ball around off, stands back and blocks
why Pakistan have only a few to chase when Babar is looking this good. Another beautiful shot. A length ball outside off, stands tall and punches it through extra cover, pierces the gap
short of length this time, gets back and blocks
short of length outside off, gets on his toes and punches it towards mid-on
fuller outside off, pushes it towards covers where van der Dussen fumbles to allow a couple
fuller around off, defended from the front foot this time
short of length, goes back and cuts but Rabada makes a stop to his left at backward point
length ball, but well outside off, left alone
a touch fuller this time, pushes it towards short extra cover
length ball outside off, covers his stumps and leaves it alone
Ngidi once again straying down the leg side, Babar misses the flick but the ball brushes his thigh and rolls to the right of de Kock. They collect a leg bye
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball at the stumps, straightens a bit after pitching forcing Azhar Ali to defend it. Initially, he was looking to work it on the leg side
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller and swinging in, but Azhar puts in a front-foot stride and places it gently between extra cover and mid-off
goes for the bouncer but the ball doesn't come out right. And up bowling a wayward one down the leg side, de Kock does well to stop it
full on off, and pushed back off the front foot
good length, just outside off stump. Slapped to point off the back foot
full on off. Big stride forward, and a jhaadu sweep to deep backward square for four
good length just outside off, and he rocks back to cut through deep point. Adds to the tally
blocked
defended
nudges it to the leg side but overthrows with the bowler not backing up allows them to take two, and gets Babar back on strike. de Kock can see the funny side of this
stands tall, punches hard as this length ball outside off comes to a perfect height to be put away to cover
fullish ball angling in, and worked to the leg side
length ball angling into his pads. Ball stays a bit low, and he glances the bat across his pads to flick it fine for four
fullish, just outside off stump. Defended off the front foot
short and wide, and he comfortably cuts this square, to the gap behind point for four. Two to win
full, on off stump. Presses forward to chop a defensive shot towards cover
full, on off stump. Big stride forward and defended
full on off stump. Caresses a drive to short cover
blocked off the front foot
fullish, just outside off. Guided towards short third man

second time Maharaj gets Babar Azam lbw but he reviews. Looked out, but what does the TV sumpire say? Almost like the first innings dismissal, although this turned a bit more across the bat. Fullish on middle, and spinning across the bat, hitting his back leg as he defends down the wrong line. Impact is on off stump, but did that turn across a bit too much?
